
1a1(yum): yum chen mo 'azhugs so//
1b1(yum): sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrer brgya pa/ dum bu bcu gnyis pa// / rim pa
1b2(yum): gnyis brgya dun bcu don dran pa// // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
1b3(yum): gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
1b4(yum): dpa' chen po dag mched du bsam te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i
1b5(yum): sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshe
1b6(yum): cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston te/ rdzu 'phrul
2a1(yum): khyi ro 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal du chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag ni bar smras te/ yongs
2a2(yum): su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
2a3(yum): chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston
2a4(yum): te/ des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems tsa ma
2a5(yum): par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen
2a6(yum): po do gnas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang bskal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsuM
2b1(yum): kyis sdug bsngal mthar byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par garigs na/
2b2(yum): lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams
2b3(yum): te sems can dmyal ba dag tu dong zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yod/
2b4(yum): su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul/
2b5(yum): gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i
2b6(yum): cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dag
2b7(yum): ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston cing / des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sem
3a1(yum): dpa' chen po de dag la sems mngon par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang
3a2(yum): ba dang // de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang bskal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim
3a3(yum): gyis theg pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal che mthar bla mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzig
3a4(yum): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du
3a5(yum): bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong ning / zhung phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni//
3a6(yum): byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen
3a7(yum): po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang /
3b1(yum): cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal
3b2(yum): chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis/ chos ston pa dang /
3b3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / gtang snyoms chen pos
3b4(yum): chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas
3b5(yum): shing // sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs
3b6(yum): nas lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par byas shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas
3b7(yum): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
3b8(yum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can
4a1(yum): a dmyal ba chen po ni zhi ba tha gas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su snyan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su
4a2(yum): bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can de dag la chos son cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal
4a3(yum): chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas ste/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan po'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub
4a4(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snyi rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des
4a5(yum): sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po
4a6(yum): de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi ngag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis thog pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong /
4a7(yum): rab 'byor 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'arnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gakrung gi
4a8(yum): dam snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can
4b1(yum): dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang
4b2(yum): cho 'phrul gsum de dag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdus
4b3(yum): bsngal de dag zhi bar byas ste/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
4b4(yum): sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems
4b5(yum): can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la mos par byas shing sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas
4b6(yum): rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim
4b7(yum): gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sman gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
4b8(yum): nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chen
5a1(yum): du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po sdug bsngal ni bar byas
5a2(yum): nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis so/
5a3(yum): can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/
5a4(yum): yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul gyi chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la
5a5(yum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po'i chos ston to// des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sem
5a6(yum): can de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ltu
5a7(yum): ba dang // de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi ngag dang bskal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis
5a8(yum): theg pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
5b1(yum): dz+wa wa rlo 'phrul nga du
5b2(yum): nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed drag na/ byang chub sems dpe'i sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsam
5b3(yum): te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /
5b4(yum): cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos bston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba
5b5(yum): chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub
5b6(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/
5b7(yum): des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems
5b8(yum): can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / lha dang mi dag dang bskal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rims kyis theg pa gsum gyis
5b9(yum): sdug bsngal las mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi
5b10(yum): nga ngag sems cad dmyal ba ched po de dag nas rnam par le sa ra'o//
6a1(yum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnon po dag chen du bsams/
6a2(yum): tesems na dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal ni bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs
6a3(yum): su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la
6a4(yum): chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag ni bar byas ste/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul
6a5(yum): dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag blams pa chen po dang / snying rje
6a6(yum): chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sem/
6a7(yum): dbu' chen pode dag la sems mas par byas shing / snyems nan dmyal bachen po de dgranas rnam par ltung ba dang / de dag sems can dmya
6a8(yum): nga'i chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang bskal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal mtha'
6b1(yum): 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga
6b2(yum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing
6b3(yum): sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan
6b4(yum): pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston
6b5(yum): cing // rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas nas/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes
6b6(yum): su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dgra' ba chen po dang / gtang snyoms chen pos
6b7(yum): chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing /
6b8(yum): sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang
7a1(yum): mi dag dang / bskal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa
7a2(yum): mthong ngo // rab 'byor 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
7a3(yum): grwa'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong
7a4(yum): zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su
7a5(yum): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyis
7a6(yum): cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas ste/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'bru
7a7(yum): kyi chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang /
7a8(yum): btang snyoms chen pos chos ston to// des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
7b1(yum): sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag las rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag las rnam par
7b2(yum): langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang bskal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor/
7b3(yum): ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
7b4(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
7b5(yum): sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur ba ma yin gyi dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pa ma yin gyis
7b6(yum): thugs su byon pa dang / mgus pas ma yin gyi gus pas shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
7b7(yum): dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sangs sa bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing gzung nas bla na med pa yang dag
8a1(yum): dar rdzogs pa'i dU chu tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du lan shing nam du yang chud mi gan to// rab
8a2(yum): ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi sman gyi 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
8a3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
8a4(yum): dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur ba ma yin gyis dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs mi byon pas ma yin
8a5(yum): thugs su ma byon pa dang / mgus pas ma yin gyi gus pas shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
8a6(yum): dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing gzung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
8a7(yum): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud mi gnon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
8a8(yum): gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rnam
8b1(yum): bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyu
8b2(yum): ba ma yin gyi degyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyis thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi gus pas shin du dad jis
8b3(yum): bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de dag yang
8b4(yum): 'dzin cing gzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud mi
8b5(yum): gzon to// rab 'byor 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
8b6(yum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/
8b7(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi dgyes par 'gyur ba dang
8b8(yum): thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyis thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyis/ gus pas shin tu dang bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub se/
9a1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing gzung nas blan
9a2(yum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang ning nam yang chud mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas
9a3(yum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
9a4(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
9a5(yum): chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bas ma yin gyi dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin
9a6(yum): kyi thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi gus pas shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
9a7(yum): dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing gzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang dul pan
9a8(yum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang ning nam du yang chud mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam
9b1(yum): bar gzigs na/ ra lho'i phyogs mtsham sa kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
9b2(yum): po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom
9b3(yum): ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pas
9b4(yum): ma yin gyi gus pas shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
9b5(yum): chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing gzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang
9b6(yum): zhing nam du yang chud mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spya l+ya gzin tun/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtsham
9b7(yum): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das wa bsnyen bkur
9b8(yum): byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin/
10a1(yum): gyi dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon bsam yin gyi thugs su byon pa dang / mgus pas ma yin gyi gus pas
10a2(yum): shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos gang bstan pa
10a3(yum): de yang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang ning nam du yang chung
10a4(yum): mi gabon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
10a5(yum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bku
10a6(yum): byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur ba ma yin//
10a7(yum): gyi dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pase ma yin gyi gus pas shin tu dang pasdu bsnyen bku
10a8(yum): byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yad 'dzin cing gzung
10b1(yum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang tshud mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di/
10b2(yum): nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i gi bye ma snyed dgra na/ byang chub
10b3(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ba rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
10b4(yum): po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyis
10b5(yum): thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi gus pas shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
10b6(yum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing gzung nas/ byang chu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
10b7(yum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang ning nam du yang chud mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
10b8(yum): la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
11a1(yum): #po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
11a2(yum): po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi thugs su
11a3(yum): byon pa dang / mgus pas ma yin gyis gus pas shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas
11a4(yum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing gzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
11a5(yum): kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi
11a6(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams
11a7(yum): kyi don du bdag yongs su btong ba byed cing / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag gcad cing gtubs
11a8(yum): phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi myi gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen zed
11b1(yum): dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa 'thob pa des byol gyi skye
11b2(yum): gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
11b3(yum): mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa
11b4(yum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim
11b5(yum): gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
11b6(yum): byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas
11b7(yum): kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
11b8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong bar byed cing / de la byang chub sem
12a1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dgra yan lag dang nying lag gcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /
12a2(yum): byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub
12a3(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam
12a4(yum): par langs nas lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs
12a5(yum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan
12a6(yum): tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung /
12a7(yum): ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rims kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'dra' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
12a8(yum): dpa'i chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni phan pa mang po byed pa'o//
12b1(yum): rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
12b2(yum): snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing
12b3(yum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag gcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song
12b4(yum): gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'
12b5(yum): sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par
12b6(yum): langs nas lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas
12b7(yum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos ste/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed
12b8(yum): pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya
13a1(yum): angan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa
13a2(yum): sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar ngan
13a3(yum): pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang cha phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
13a4(yum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don
13a5(yum): du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcud cing gtubs
13a6(yum): phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
13a7(yum): gri gzos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa 'thob pa des byol song gi
13a8(yum): skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as
13b1(yum): de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa
13b2(yum): rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
13b3(yum): la chos thos ste/ de bzhin du nan tan byed pang du/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po phung po
13b4(yum): ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sem
13b5(yum): dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa
13b6(yum): mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig
13b7(yum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnam
13b8(yum): kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong bar byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag gcad cing gtubs

14a2(yum): byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas lA dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas

14a8(yum): rteni la rnam par gzigs na/ skye'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i glang gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sem
14b1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sem/
14b2(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag gcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byo la song gi skye

14b8(yum): ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa
15a1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin

15a3(yum): par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa

15a8(yum): skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchis par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dgal banini/

16a1(yum): dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag la byams pa 'thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang
16a2(yum): zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de

16a5(yum): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na

16a7(yum): yang 'di na sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og go phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed drug na/
16a8(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag tshul song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chu/
16b1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems
16b2(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nyin lag gcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su
16b3(yum): gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

16b5(yum): mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
16b6(yum): dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am
16b7(yum): theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na bya
16b8(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa
17a1(yum): dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzig
17a2(yum): na steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye
17a3(yum): gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang
17a4(yum): nyid lag bcad cing gtungs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye ga togs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dgra
17a5(yum): sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gau sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
17a6(yum): bodade dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas lha dang mi
17a7(yum): nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
17a8(yum): dag li bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag
17b1(yum): nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po'o ma/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
17b2(yum): pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag/
17b3(yum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tu byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa byed pa'o// // 'phags pa zhes rab kyi pha
17b4(yum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// dum bu bcu gnyis pa/ bam po gnyis brgya bdun cu don bdun pa// rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
17b5(yum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
17b6(yum): can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spangs pa'i
17b7(yum): phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed/
17b8(yum): cing yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag gnas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam dpar langs nas/ dge ba'i rtse
18a1(yum): pa de nyid kyis lnga'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten tu skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs
18a2(yum): su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang rnam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor 'di nas sangs rgyas
18a3(yum): kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lce phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
18a4(yum): dpa' chen po yi dwags kyi yul ba rnams kyi rnam par// yigs kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil nyid ser
18a5(yum): sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i
18a6(yum): sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par longs nas/
18a7(yum): dge ba'i pa de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan la
18a8(yum): 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab
18b1(yum): 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
18b2(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
18b3(yum): thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser spangs pa'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems
18b4(yum): dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag
18b5(yum): nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
18b6(yum): dbyings su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs
18b7(yum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
18b8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ci snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu
19a1(yum): 'jil zhing ser sna srung ba'i phyir/ de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
19a2(yum): dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing yi dgas kyi yul skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par lan
19a3(yum): nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs
19a4(yum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'brul bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzig
19a5(yum): na byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi
19a6(yum): dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de rnam dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir ro/
19a7(yum): ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pade dag byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /
19a8(yum): kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di nyid kyis lha'i 'a
19b1(yum): rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
19b2(yum): rnams dang nam du yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par gzigs na
19b3(yum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi
19b4(yum): yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de
19b5(yum): dag sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gan
19b6(yum): de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'dzi
19b7(yum): rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skyes ste/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom
19b8(yum): ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzin
20a1(yum): nA nub kyi phyogs marnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi skye ma skyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
20a2(yum): dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhings
20a3(yum): sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag ni sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sem
20a4(yum): bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
20a5(yum): de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom
20a6(yum): ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzig
20a7(yum): na// nung byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
20a8(yum): can yi dgas kyi yul ba rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna
20a9(yum): 'jig der
20b1(yum): ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed
20b2(yum): cing yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha
20b3(yum): 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan
20b4(yum): 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na
20b5(yum): 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa
20b6(yum): rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag
20b7(yum): na sems can yi dgas kyi yul de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas
20b8(yum): nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten
21a1(yum): du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya dran las 'das kyi bar dusangs rgyas com ldan 'a
21a2(yum): rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi skyon gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi
21a3(yum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba rnams kyi
21a4(yum): yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems
21a5(yum): can yi dgas kyi yul de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag
21a6(yum): nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa bo'i de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i las
21a7(yum): chen du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang sprul
21a8(yum): par mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab byong ngas yang 'din sa sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ gar thugs kyi /
21b1(yum): 'phrul dga'ang
21b2(yum): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bani'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cun
21b3(yum): gsum dang / mche ma dang dga' ldan dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/
21b4(yum): lha'i bu dag gis chos de thos pa dang / theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba da/
21b5(yum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de
21b6(yum): dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams//
21b7(yum): cad ni sdug bsngal ba 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed tham/
21b8(yum): ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shos chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sa
21b9(yum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
22a1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang mtshe ma dang
22a2(yum): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pode
22a3(yum): dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su
22a4(yum): ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu de dag lha'i gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas/
22a5(yum): cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag spro bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs pa dga'/
22a6(yum): byed thams cad 'i sug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni yod brtan du mi rung ba/ byed thams cad rnam pa tha pa sa can yin/
22a7(yum): dmasal sa pa na / snor ngas yong 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi shAn kyis 'dzig da ldanam /
22a8(yum): rigs pa/ phyogs kyi gas na kyi mas ga ga'i zung gi rgyam snyed dag na/ byang chub pams da kyisems dpa' chen pa rgyal
22b1(yum): bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
22b2(yum): rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim
22b3(yum): gyis yongs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong
22b4(yum): ste// rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar 'gyur
22b5(yum): bar shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med
22b6(yum): pa// 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan tu mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na
22b7(yum): 'du byed rnams la su zhig yid 'bebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
22b8(yum): gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bani ma
23a1(yum): aris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / gsum cu rtsa gsum dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gan/
23a2(yum): 'phrul dbang byed kyis lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas
23a3(yum): theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
23a4(yum): 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lho'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar
23a5(yum): byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes te/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal pa
23a6(yum): 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad nim brtan pa/ 'di byed thams cad ni yid brgyan tu mi rung ba/ 'du byed byamam cad nan
23a7(yum): spyan gyis 'jig rnan pa rnam par gtogs ni/ bya 'i gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyikhams gang ga'i klung gi byem snyed dgan/ rtsa
23b1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang
23b2(yum): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag/
23b3(yum): khas lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das
23b4(yum): pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal
23b5(yum): med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar 'gyur shes na/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa/ 'du byed
23b6(yum): thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba
23b7(yum): 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos bston to// rab 'byor pa
23b8(yum): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma sa
24a1(yum): dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bani'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum/
24a2(yum): dang mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
24a3(yum): dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang / yongs
24a4(yum): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor 'di la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de
24a5(yum): dag 'bar bar snang bar shing / de dag skyo bar 'gyur bar shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams
24a6(yum): cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan tu mi rung
24a7(yum): 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'phyo
24a8(yum): ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
24b1(yum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang /
24b2(yum): mtsho ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
24b3(yum): dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yong
24b4(yum): su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shar cher
24b5(yum): myos pas de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed
24b6(yum): thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid mi brtan pa/
24b7(yum): 'du byed thams cad ni yid brten du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su nig yid
24b8(yum): phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang
25a1(yum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
25a2(yum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / marna ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gnan 'phrul dbang byed
25a3(yum): kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis
25a4(yum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu ga
25a5(yum): 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos par de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar 'gyur bar shes nas/ 'di skad du
25a6(yum): grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni ma
25a7(yum): brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan tu mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la la su nis/
25a8(yum): yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten gyi khamasu ga ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
25b1(yum): 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen ba ni'i ris kyi lha rnams la
25b2(yum): chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang
25b3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das
25b4(yum): par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan
25b5(yum): lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar 'gyur bar shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag
25b6(yum): 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung
25b7(yum): ba 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas
25b8(yum): yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na
26a1(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen ba'i 'o ras kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu gsum dang /
26a2(yum): ma dang dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
26a3(yum): dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las
26a4(yum): 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gnal
26a5(yum): med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar 'gyur bar shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed
26a6(yum): thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung /
26a7(yum): 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyu ro ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnamaso la lta su nig yid khebs par gnas nis chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas ya
26a8(yum): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs ni// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang
26b1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta bu la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa
26b2(yum): la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsong sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste
26b3(yum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor
26b4(yum): de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
26b5(yum): spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
26b6(yum): sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i 'jig lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la
26b7(yum): ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha sta ga la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste
26b8(yum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos son to/
27a1(yum): rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor/
27a2(yum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
27a3(yum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad
27a4(yum): stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob da sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong
27a5(yum): ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab
27a6(yum): 'byor de ni ngo mtshar naste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs
27a7(yum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi byem skyed dgan/ byang chub sems
27a8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'ilta pa la mngon par nan pa de dgal kye grogs pa de dag chos thams cad stong pa la chinas/
27b1(yum): lbu ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob shA stag la TI zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor
27b2(yum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor nga ni
27b3(yum): ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spya
27b4(yum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
27b5(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa
27b6(yum): la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gso ba sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste
27b7(yum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// 8
27b8(yum): 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs
28a1(yum): / rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang
28a2(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dedag chos thams cad
28a3(yum): stod pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral byed pa mthong
28a4(yum): ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to// /
28a5(yum): rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas
28a6(yum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grang ga'i klung gi bye ma
28a7(yum): skyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la
28a8(yum): thags po dag ces thams dang gang pa la tshigags babyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsopa gsam mkhyen ga su byung ma pa na
28b1(yum): rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /
28b2(yum): sems can rnams la chos ston ste/ rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos
28b3(yum): so// rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
28b4(yum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa
28b5(yum): de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces
28b6(yum): lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po gnas
28b7(yum): shing sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i
28b8(yum): chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
29a1(yum): gang ga'i klung gi byem snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang ngas pa'i lta
29a2(yum): la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad snang ba la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gso sha stag la ci zhig
29a3(yum): lta ba skyed/ shA ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
29a4(yum): snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad
29a5(yum): du 'byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
29a6(yum): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la
29a7(yum): kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed cing lta ba'i rnam pa
29a8(yum): de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sring rjechen po rnams sring rje chen po la
29b1(yum): shing sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos sor ba
29b2(yum): 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma skyed
29b3(yum): dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig
29b4(yum): snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten lnga rnam par gzigs na/ lho
29b5(yum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed drag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po
29b6(yum): bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / dron spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sa
29b7(yum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
29b8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bani gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyod pa da//
30a1(yum): don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi
30a2(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po ba nis sdud pa
30a3(yum): mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
30a4(yum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sor
30a5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bani gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa
30a6(yum): dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi
30a7(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgun/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis srung
30a8(yum): pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas
30b1(yum): kyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'/
30b2(yum): sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang
30b3(yum): don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
30b4(yum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/
30b5(yum): bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
30b6(yum): la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
30b7(yum): mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig sman pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'a
30b8(yum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi byem no/
31a1(yum): dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang ni
31a2(yum): na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don du rna pa dang / don mthun pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum
31a3(yum): bu bcu gnyis pa// bam po gnyis brgya don brgyad pa// / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
31a4(yum): chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems
31a5(yum): can rnams sdud de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
31a6(yum): dpa' chen po ming ming gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin na na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
31a7(yum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gser ma/ dngul lam/ nor bu mi/ mu tig gam/ 'dzu ma/ rung ma/ yan sel la/ byi ru 'am/ sa le snam
31a8(yum): gsas ma/ som mam/ gdugs sam/ gos sam/ thos sam/ 'greng ba'am/ byug pa'am/ mal cha'am/ stan nas/ 'tsho ba 'am/
31b1(yum): med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ rta 'am/ glang po 'am/ bdagra yongs su gtong na/ 'dri skad du sems can dag chur sheg/ bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar
31b2(yum): slar mi dgos par da khyer cig long la deng shig ces rjod de/ sbyin pa des sbyin pa de nyid byin na/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ngo // chos la sbya
31b3(yum): su dong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabs su dong ngo // la la ni bslab pa'i gnas lnga la 'dzin du 'dzud do// la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas/
31b4(yum): pa la nye bar gnas par byed do// la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan dang po la 'god do// la la ni bas
31b5(yum): gtan gnyis pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do// la la ni byams pa la
31b6(yum): 'god do// la la ni snying rje la 'god do// la la ni dga' ba la 'god do// la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do// la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas
31b7(yum): skye mched la 'god do// la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// la la ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched la 'god do// la la ni 'dun
31b8(yum): mod 'du shes med min skye mched la 'god do// ma la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la yang dag par bskul lo// lo la ni chos rjes su dran pa la yang dag
32a1(yum): bskul lo// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni rdul khrims rjes su dran pa la yang dag par bskur
32a2(yum): lo// la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni lus la mi gtsang
32a3(yum): las sogs pa'i 'du shes su so sor brtag pa la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni dran pa nye bar
32a4(yum): gnag pa nye bar bzhi la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la
32a5(yum): yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni dbang po lnga la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni stobs lnga la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni byang chub kyi yan
32a6(yum): lag bdun la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
32a7(yum): med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting de 'dzin la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni rnam pa'athar ba brgyad la yang dag par 'askul lo// la la ni ma
32a8(yum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul yang dag par 'phrul lo// mal ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mangs bcul yang dag par bskul lo//
32b1(yum): la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni byams pa chen po
32b2(yum): la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni snying rje chen po la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par
32b3(yum): bskul lo// la la ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su sgrub par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu 'gru
32b4(yum): pa la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang
32b5(yum): dag par bskul lo// la la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par bskul lo// la la
32b6(yum): ni rang byang chub la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la yang dag par bskul lo// la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
32b7(yum): ba nyid la yang dag par bskul lo// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
32b8(yum): sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa'i bde dang ldan par 'god do// rab 'byor de ni byang
33a1(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngom ra zad du 'byung bas so// rab byong byung ji ltar na byung
33a2(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin ne na/ rab 'byor gnas
33a3(yum): po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig
33a4(yum): rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / ma nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang
33a5(yum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang /
33a6(yum): mthun mong du gyur gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
33a7(yum): ba nges 'jig rten gyi chos kyi snyan pa de babyung nas rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi rlos ma nor bar bslabs pa de las babyung ngo // de nas
33a8(yum): nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos kyis 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do// de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 'phags pa
33b1(yum): chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bani dang / rdzu 'phrul
33b2(yum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / rnam par
33b3(yum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
33b4(yum): bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
33b5(yum): dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/
33b6(yum): shes pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi phyin pa shes pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes
33b7(yum): pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni shes
33b8(yum): pa'o khyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid/
33b9(yum): ra po stong pa nyid shes pa'o//
34a1(yum): shesung ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// thog pa dang mthu ma med pa bang ba nyid shes dang // dong ba med pa snong bcud shes pam/
34a2(yum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dang
34a3(yum): po med pa spong ba nyid shes pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dran pache bar gnag pa ni shes pa'o//
34a4(yum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o// dbang po lnga shes pa'o// stobs lnga shes pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes
34a5(yum): pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bani shes pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o// tshad med pa bzhi shes pa'o// gzug
34a6(yum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad shes pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes pa'o// rnam par ma
34a7(yum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa shes pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams thos pa'o// gzungs kyi
34a8(yum): rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spongs shes pa'o// mi 'jigs pani shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa pani shes pa'o// sa
34b1(yum): ma'adres pa bco brgyad shes bya'o// byams brten mo shes pa'o// snying rje chen po zhes pa'o// dga' ba chen po shes pa'o// btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang /
34b2(yum): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag dang bcas dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos
34b3(yum): rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma rtogs par de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams
34b4(yum): so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
34b5(yum): cad spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan
34b6(yum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
34b7(yum): ram bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa de ni rnam pa
34b8(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
35a1(yum): sa/ smra sa
35a2(yum): ka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur b.ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brjes par bya'o//
35a3(yum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la mun pa med pa thob pa la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la
35a4(yum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya bar med do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa/
35a5(yum): ste// de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig
35a6(yum): rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing / thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
35a7(yum): la bkod pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'o chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong
35a8(yum): mam yin pa na/ ldan pa yang garnag zhin dang / yang dag par spong ba ni dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi pa'i dang / dang pa dang / thangs
35b1(yum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par mthar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
35b2(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / smon lam gyi shes pa dang /
35b3(yum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / yongs su dag pa bzhi dang / dbang po bcu dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / saso yang dag par
35b4(yum): rig pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs
35b5(yum): pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang /
35b6(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
35b7(yum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/ 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa
35b8(yum): zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste na'i khru kra dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson
36a1(yum): grus gas bshin du ldan pa na da na shA/
36a2(yum): lus la na 'byung ba'i rjes su la zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la bang pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sras la dun byung ba dang ba dus su
36a3(yum): par spyod do// lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig dru gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi tshor nga dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / byi nang gi tshor ba'i
36a4(yum): su lnga zhing 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// tshong ba la sman
36a5(yum): byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lnga ning rnam par spyod do// tshor ba
36a6(yum): la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi sems dang phyi'i sems dang / byi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjesu lta zhing brtson
36a7(yum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// sems nan 'byung ba'i rdzas
36a8(yum): la zhing mardzun pargyad// sems la kun byung ba dang / rang pa'i rjes su lha zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la mi gnas pa
