36b1(yum): spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa ldan pas/ 'jig rjed kyi
36b2(yum): tshogs sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par gsal cing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos su lta ring rnam par rjes su lta
36b3(yum): zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la mi gnas par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye ba ro len pa
36b4(yum): med do// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to mi dge ba'i ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams sbyong ba'i phyir
36b5(yum): rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed cing brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang
36b6(yum): bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ gang mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed
36b7(yum): dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems can gyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin so
36b8(yum): ba 'i'adu byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi nang ba'o// dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dngas
37a1(yum): po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / drun pa dbyung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang zas/ de dag ni dbang po lda
37a2(yum): bya'o// stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dang po'i stobs dang / btsun 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i skabs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs pa
37a3(yum): de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa
37a4(yum): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shi tu
37a5(yum): pa yang dag byang chub yan lags dang / 'dzidi yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan las / ra
37a6(yum): chub ci yan lag bdu shes bya'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa glang zhe na/ 'di lta ste yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag
37a7(yum): pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i bsnol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran
37a8(yum): pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag 'phags pa'i lam lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhen/ stong pa nyid
37a9(yum): 'phags pa skyabs kyi shog bu bzhi pa
37b1(yum): ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// spyod pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i
37b2(yum): rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par
37b3(yum): sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sem
37b4(yum): rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par mthar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par mthar pa dang
37b5(yum): po'o/ nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par mthar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par mthar
37b6(yum): pa gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par mthar pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgru/
37b7(yum): te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par mthar pa lnga pa'o// ba cung zad med pa'i spyod la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par mthar pa drug pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med
37b8(yum): min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par mthar pa bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par ma
38a1(yum): bababyud ba ste/ dedaganarnam par mtha ba brgyad ces rgya/ ra rgyal gas pa sgrubs par 'jug pa dgu gang nan/ 'jal la la 'a
38a2(yum): dben sdig tom dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa la dga' ba dang bde ba can gsam gtan dang po la nye bar
38a3(yum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod bzhi bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyu gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa
38a4(yum): ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dranas
38a5(yum): dang ldan zhing shes bzhin tu btang snyoms su gnas te bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa
38a6(yum): shes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba da
38a7(yum): yod mi bde bsdu nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med pa sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang spobs dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgru
38a8(yum): te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'dra shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams chu par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'duzhes yid la
38b1(yum): byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
38b2(yum): mched las yang dag par langs te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgra bas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchod
38b3(yum): la yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod do// zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched
38b4(yum): las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med min skyed mched
38b5(yum): las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o//
38b6(yum): de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dgas dang / mtha' dge chu dang / mtha' dag me dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag
38b7(yum): ser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha' dag na mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag skye mched bcu zhes
38b8(yum): bya'o// de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong
39a1(yum): yang gzugs de dag la bya na sa rnal gyis ma du mam na nga bajugs pa den thal gyis gnan pa'i snyam da da
39a2(yum): nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gis mnan te mthong zhing /
39a3(yum): ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha do/
39a4(yum): sdug mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnan pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o
39a5(yum): nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang kha dog pa sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis ma can gyi shes
39a6(yum): tshil gis gnan mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyi gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs ston pa
39a7(yum): kha dog sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngon po 'di ltad+hU per na me tog 'o ma kau lta bu'am/ yul bar na ser byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba kha dog sngo bar snang ba mdog
39a8(yum): mdog sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis gnan te shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched
39b1(yum): lnga pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser ser por snang ba mdog ser po 'di lta ste dper na 'di lta ste shing
39b2(yum): dgar shi ka'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul bar na ser byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba kha dog ser ba se ri bar snang ba mdog ser ba mthong yang gzugs de dag
39b3(yum): zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni gzil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs
39b4(yum): dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar por snang ba mdog dmar po 'di lta ste dper na man 'ji ba ka'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul ba ran ser byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba
39b5(yum): dog dmar ba dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes par 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o// nang gzug
39b6(yum): med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar por snang ba mdog dkar po 'di lta ste/ dper na skar ma pa ba sangs kyi mdog lta bu
39b7(yum): 'am/ yul bar na sder byas pa'i gos ltar dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar bar snang ba mdog dkar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag gzil gyis mnan
39b8(yum): shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la
40a1(yum): gnas nas byang chubasams dpa' sems dpa tshan pa 'dam par sbyong pa/ sems na rol tu dang gang zag pa rol tu gan mongs pa'am
40a2(yum): ba'i mthu yod pa/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis grub pa den nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o// phrin lamatsho shes pa gang shes nas/ sam gtan la gnas te 'jigs par bya'o zhes kyi
40a3(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa 'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par gyur ba de la yid kyil smod pa med de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las la
40a4(yum): nas de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cing / shes bya de yang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa shes bya'o// de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul
40a5(yum): mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gan/
40a6(yum): rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag bzad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go// de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus mongs su sa
40a7(yum): dang / dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dag pa ste bzhi po de dag go/ de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ che la dbang ba dang
40a8(yum): sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la
40b1(yum): dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ chos bcu po de dag go// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la
40b2(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la gnas su yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du/
40b3(yum): rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas pa kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag
40b4(yum): ba ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ khams sna tshogs can dang khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan
40b5(yum): dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji ltar ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang por ba
40b6(yum): dang / zab shes par bya ba yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa'i ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po dang /
40b7(yum): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par mthar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
40b8(yum): rnam par byang ba rnam par 'god pa yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu khyen to// rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rab sa gcig kyang rjes su
41a1(yum): dgos pa nas/ serabs brgya dang / mer bas stong dang / rabs bye ba khrag tsug brgya nang ga par du yang rjes su dgongs so// bskal pa gtsa
41a2(yum): kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / bsrel ba brgyad phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag dum dang / bskal pa brgya stong du ma dang / bskal
41a3(yum): ba bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs ste/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go// ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ rus ni 'di zhes
41a4(yum): bar 'gyur ro// rus ni 'don zhes zla bar gyur to/ ris ni 'di ni bya bar gyur to// zas ni 'di zas za'o yun ni 'di sring gcig tu gnas gnas sa// che'i mtha' da
41a5(yum): tsam zhig tu gyur to// bdag de nas 'chi 'phos nas/ che ge mo zhig tu skyes so// bya ba na sa nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam par
41a6(yum): bcas/ sa lam dang bcas bstan tshig dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so lnga'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas
41a7(yum): sems can shi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag kyang gzigs so// kha dog bsdug pa dang mi bsdug pa dang / bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / bde 'gron 'khang pa
41a8(yum): ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ci ltar ba bzhin du nye par 'dod pa'i sems can rab kyi mkhyen to// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nang du spyod pa dang ldan pa
41b1(yum): ngag gis ngan tu spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du baspyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log pa lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis
41b2(yum): lus zhig gnas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs pa
41b3(yum): spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus shig nas
41b4(yum): bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par 'grol ba dang / shes rab rnam pa grol ba
41b5(yum): zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa
41b6(yum): bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag
41b7(yum): la dge sbyong dam/ zam ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/
41b8(yum): zhes bya ba'i rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi thong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bdag bde ba thob pa dang
42a1(yum): / bag rgyu ba med pa thob pa dang / ma 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyad / khyu mchog brlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'/ 'khor ldan
42a2(yum): seng ge'i sgru ba sgrogs so// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lU 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/
42a3(yum): dang ldan pa re bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag bzad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zad pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par
42a4(yum): ma gyur to// zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ bskye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rtenan
42a5(yum): chos ngasaldan par grol par gyur ro// bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rdzas sum mazang ste/ sku yang dag pur rjes sum mthong bas des po sa pa sa
42a6(yum): pa dang / bgacha pa med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de// rgya mchog brlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng gen
42a7(yum): smra bsgrog go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan
42a8(yum): bar bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na par chad kyi chos
42b1(yum): mi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong dam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan du yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par
42b2(yum): bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa
42b3(yum): thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par rnam spyod do// khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dum bca'o// mkhor gyi nang du se ge'i sgra sgrog ko/ rbangasra pa'i
42b4(yum): pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar ma
42b5(yum): nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs pa 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad
42b6(yum): par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi byung ngo // zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am
42b7(yum): bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su
42b8(yum): mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde bar thob pa dang / bag cha ba med bzo ba dang / mi 'jigs pa thob rnam par spyod de/
43a1(yum): khru mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// gakhar ci nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrog go// tshangs pa'i latshal 'jig rten na dge slong sa/ ma/
43a2(yum): 'am/ lA'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// zhes bya ste/ ni
43a3(yum): po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'o soso yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos yang dag
43a4(yum): par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag gang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la
43a5(yum): dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhi
43a6(yum): gshegs pa'i su'i stong pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sgram spya pa yongs sum dag 'am sanga' bsal las shes su'aja rnas
43a7(yum): par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'do na srung ba med pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa
43a8(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa la srung gi spyod pa yongs sum dag pa mi mnga' bsal la shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgengs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sem
43b1(yum): ste/ 'di ni srung med pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su
43b2(yum): ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni srung ba med pa gsum pa'o//
43b3(yum): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ la la rna ba btud de rim 'gror nyan cing bag la
43b4(yum): nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan tu byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar ma 'gyur/
43b5(yum): thugs yid yeng por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btud der ma 'gror nyan cing dka nyan pa'i sems nye bar 'jog pa
43b6(yum): med pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan du mi byed na/ yang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur/ thugs mi ches
43b7(yum): par mi 'gyur te/ de ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba bdud te rim 'gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar bzhog la/ chos dang
43b8(yum): gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba gtud de rim 'gror mi nyan cing bka' mi nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos
44a1(yum): / la nan tan du mi byed kyang des de bzhin gshegs pa la dgyes pa'am/ thugs khro ba gnas su mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan ni
44a2(yum): mkhyen par gtang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/
44a3(yum): gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'ad ba ste/ 'dunas
44a4(yum): pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ 'an thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni ga
44a5(yum): mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de ltar bu yang mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu ba spangs
44a6(yum): ba zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi mdzar
44a7(yum): bar gzung ste/ dge pa'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten lazhin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum su rdzogs pa ma sa
44a8(yum): ste/ dngos sun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa/
44b1(yum): par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshe
44b2(yum): pa la khrul pa mi mnga'o// ca com mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'/ 'du shes sna mtshogs mi mnga' 'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o//
44b3(yum): ma rtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// dgongs pa yongs
44b4(yum): su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams ngami
44b5(yum): mnga'o// rnam par grol ba ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes su 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang
44b6(yum): ba'o// gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro/
44b7(yum): ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma mchags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs par 'jug go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus nam mchog/
44b8(yum): ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs par 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs par 'jug pa ste/ de dag ni sangs
45a1(yum): / rgyas kyi chos pa 'das parnams so/ rab 'byur bzhan gnas bya sgyu sa mkhyang pazhing gang shes ga sman su
45a2(yum): dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid dbang ba'i mtshan med ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ces d+ha'o/ de la
45a3(yum): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ brag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa
45a4(yum): dang phyag dang zhabs za bar 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yang
45a5(yum): pa dang / sku che zhing drang pa dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu dang
45a6(yum): byug par drang por brlabs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog pa dang mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / s+phu ri ri nas
45a7(yum): g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod bus brgya zla dang / seng ge'o stod lta bu dang / zag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / brags shin du
45a8(yum): pa dang / ro mo mchog dang / shing gro ta ltar chu ning gis pa dang / dbu suM ga~M tsug dang ldan pa dang / lpags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyang
45b1(yum): seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / chems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnam zhing bzhi bcu pa
45b2(yum): tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi 'thil la 'khor lo tsa bis stong dang
45b3(yum): ldan pa/ mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa ma pa so la gzugs bkos pa dang 'dra ba mad
45b4(yum): bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs shin tu
45b5(yum): gnas pa'o/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o// shing bal gyi ye'u lhar
45b6(yum): shin tu 'jam shing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu ma thob pas mdun shin tu man
45b7(yum): ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi so ring bas sor mo rang bas sor mo ring ba'o// rting pa ring bar rting pa yangs pa'o// sku lag pa mdun du 'phags
45b8(yum): pa la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o// pus mo'i lha dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho bo'o// spu bgyen du g.yas phyog
46a1(yum): sbrul gyil bas yan lag gi sa rdzun dul tshal ba'o// rig gus yin pa'i byin pa dang / stsog ma dang / ldum zung rab ltar drang
46a2(yum): ma nyams la rim gyis gzhol bar/ grub cing byin pa zlum pas ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu'o// rwa drang por bzhag ste/ ma btud kyang phyag gi
46a3(yum): mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa phyag rA drang por brlabs pa'o// glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par spangs
46a4(yum): su nub pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go// gser dang dngul
46a5(yum): shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la/ sbrul rdul ma gos pas mdzagashin du 'jam pa'o// shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sla res
46a6(yum): skyes shing gnyis su med pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su mkhyil po'o// me tog kun d+ha dang / zla ba dang / 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'jug la/ nyam
46a7(yum): ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod sus sprin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas nal mdzod spus rgyan pa'o// ra mang rtsibs seng chenan
46a8(yum): po mgur dang byung legs par legs par 'brel cing rgyun num pas zag pa'i gyu pa sa par grub pa'o// gso gyi gtan pa byis pa lang thug pa sa tsho
46b1(yum): par grub pas 'phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang khrigs pa dang bad kan gyis ma nyams shing rnam par shes pa 'dre ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go/
46b2(yum): sku chu zheng mdom du mnyam pas shing nyagro da ltar chu zheng gang ba'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / ldan pa'i dbu mnya
46b3(yum): zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa 'da' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ud pa la dmar po'i mda' ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yang
46b4(yum): pas lpags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang bya ka la bing ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me long gyi dkyil
46b5(yum): 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun da dang dung gi bcag phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i
46b6(yum): mtshams shin tu dkar ba'o// mchems la mthon dman med pas mchems ma nyams pa'o// mtshems la mtshams ma dod pa mi mnga' bas mtshems
46b7(yum): thags bzang ba'o// bA 'og tu dgye gu med pas mtshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o// dkar gnag gis cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog
46b8(yum): dmar po sa ma g.yogs pas spun dkar gnag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la mdzengs pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma'i bsgyel
47a1(yum): sa smra uSh+ma k+Sha sa su sgyu su smra
47a2(yum): ngangaldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i sA las so// yi dmal brtan pas don pos shin tu gnas pas/ deni po ga yo zhi shin tu btan pa'i sngaltas so// smran
47a3(yum): ras rags na pa dang / 'on kyang pa dang / ring mthun pa'i bsnu ba rnam pani sems par byas phyag deng zhapas dram pa khrel ba ste// den srung 'dra ba'i sngags so/
47a4(yum): bdang bca' ba dang gzung bzhim zhing rnams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gnon zhing mjam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho' ba ste/ de gnyis ni gza' bdang
47a5(yum): bca' ba dang btung bzhim zhing nyams su bde' ba thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa bgrol ba dang / srog gi rim 'gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas sar
47a6(yum): mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ ri nin sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / gzung ba dang / mngon par sde
47a7(yum): zhing 'grib par ma byas zhabs kyi gong ma tho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas s+ho// rig pa dang bzan las
47a8(yum): ri 'gror byas shing gzhan byed pa dang bdag gis blangs pas ring gis yin ma byin pa ga bus// de sa byung du 'dzin pa'i srigamam/ mangs cing mang pa /
47b1(yum): la bslangs na mi 'god par gtong zhing med ces ma byas phyag rwa drang por bsdeb pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so// grogs po dang mdza' shes dang /
47b2(yum): gnyen ma phye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par skal ba dang / bsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrugs pas gsang ba'i gnas sgrub
47b3(yum): su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so// stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas/ gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu
47b4(yum): 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni gdan dang / na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so// 'du 'ji spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang
47b5(yum): slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu nu las stsogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra' bar rim 'gror byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bcol ba la rnam gzan pas spa re re
47b6(yum): nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so// mi snyam par mi zer zhing mi smon la snyan par smra zhing mi smod
47b7(yum): la snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa 'thun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i ro snod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa meng pa'i sa
47b8(yum): ltas so/ na ba rnams la rtsi dang rim 'gro dang sman dang / nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim 'gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro ma
48a1(yum): du stsa smra
48a2(yum): da 'phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang / btsugs lag khang bya ba la stsogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gnying zhing / bdag gis gzhan gyid pas
48a3(yum): bzod ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu sdig tsug dang ldan pa ste/ de na mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i sngalus so// yun ring po tshig dran bcing 'jam pa dang / rnams sa
48a4(yum): bde bar smras pas ljags shin nu yangs shing srab pa dang / rlangs pa'i dbyangs ste/ de gnyis ni yan lag lu ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i sa las so
48a5(yum): gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'byung ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab
48a6(yum): cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / gdang mi za zhing rnar snyan pa dang / mkhrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig khrul ba spangs shing dus su s+thA smra
48a7(yum): bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lnga bu ste/ de ni rin tshig kun gyis rgan pa'i sngags so// rim 'gror bya ba dang brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tshob yongs su dag
48a8(yum): bsas rnams shin bu dkar ba ring mkham pa ste/ den 'khongs nas gsags pa'i sngams pa// yun ring po nas paden zhing bram med pa'i tshigs mas
48b1(yum): mtshems thags bzang ba dang / mtshams mnyam zhing zhi bcu chang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i sA ltas so// bang gis khyud pa bzhin du nyes
48b2(yum): par bsams pa med la/ ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta ba lta bas/ spyan kwa re ga nag dbyes pa dang / pa'i rdzi ma lta bu ste
48b3(yum): de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan gsum cu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs/
48b4(yum): ba'i dpe'i byad bzang po brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben
48b5(yum): pa ste/ sen mo grangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dis rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la
48b6(yum): phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste
48b7(yum): sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kha na mtho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
48b8(yum): 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rims kyis
49a1(yum): // grub pa ste/ slong ma ras rgyas gtsum pa yas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams nAM thugs dang gusang dang smram ldan la
49a2(yum): dang / mtsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i 'dud pa 'grol ba ste/ rtsal
49a3(yum): pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long du mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
49a4(yum): rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las grol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mo mnyam pa thams
49a5(yum): las bral ba ste/ zhabs ma mnyam pa yin/ sang sargyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ma'i seng ge ste/ se ge'i 'gros su bzhud ba yin/ sangs
49a6(yum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ma'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dang pa'i rgyal pol
49a7(yum): mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ rang ba'i skabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni ma'i khyu mchog ste// khyu mchog gi skabs su bcu
49a8(yum): pa yin sangs rgyas bcom tham sa rnams mthun pa'i mam sangang ba'i// gams grogs su bzud po min/ sangs rgyas batsham ni ngas ma na
49b1(yum): blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa/
49b2(yum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul
49b3(yum): rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ sku shin
49b4(yum): tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rnams rim gyis ston pa ste/ skra rims kyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
49b5(yum): rnams ni chos rnams rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rims kyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste//
49b6(yum): sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'dam pa dang ldan sku shin du 'jams pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
49b7(yum): ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos
49b8(yum): dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe'i byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste
50a1(yum): su tsho ra zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mazhag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/
50a2(yum): legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu mjam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ glu shin tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
50a3(yum): ldan 'das nI rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mdul ba ste/ sra zhum paster ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
50a4(yum): cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ spu shin tu mkhregs pa
50a5(yum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang zhin
50a6(yum): lag smra bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang bar rab rib med cing rna/
50a7(yum): par dge ba yin/ spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rdul dang ldan pa'i slob mamangar ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom/
50a8(yum): ldan 'das rnams ni labar ba'i rnas pa thams cad zhin tu sbyangs pa ste/ bral shin du byung ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
50b1(yum): rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ phul byam che
50b2(yum): 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa bste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
50b3(yum): ni mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su khyil ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i
50b4(yum): dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas tshad med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin cung ma dang ldan pa ste/ kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/
50b5(yum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la sme ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
50b6(yum): 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang rab tu thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
50b7(yum): rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu za ba
50b8(yum): cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi rim mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ra
52a1(yum): // rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyu 'das par 'dul ba bakhas pa ste/ nam 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ spangs rgyas bam lda na snun pas na/
52a2(yum): sbyin thams cad mkhyen pas// sprin ma'i su marnam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa bsnam gyis sems sus
52a3(yum): par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu langs ning nga
52a4(yum): ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ sman legs shing skan shel ring ba yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa
52a5(yum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas
52a6(yum): bcom ldan 'das ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ ma gapas pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rmyil /
52a7(yum): nam pa thams cad yongs su byung ba ste/ zhal 'bral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zas kyis rdol drani
52a8(yum): tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas
52b1(yum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi brang ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu brang ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
52b2(yum): 'das rnams ni thong ba dang bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu sdug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pas
52b3(yum): bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbus mi
52b4(yum): 'dzings pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ba rlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
52b5(yum): rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi spos kyi me tog gis skye bo 'thun par gyur pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni phyag dang zhabs
52b6(yum): dpal gyi bre'u dang / bkra shis dang / dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin no// rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang dgra bcom pa yang dag par
52b7(yum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe'i byad bzang po brgyad bcu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa
52b8(yum): dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
53a1(yum): / chen posemasas rnams zang zang gi sbyin pa dang / chos pa bskyed pas spyad pa man / rab 'gyung ngom byang chub sems dpal
53a2(yum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma mad du byung ba'i mas// / zhes rab tu phyi rol tu phyin pa cung zag brgya pa das braban rnaM pa/
53a3(yum): bam po ni brgya don dgu// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams bsdud pa yin zhe na
53a4(yum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams bsrung ba yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i
53a5(yum): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
53a6(yum): rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do//
53a7(yum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
53a8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig sman par skabs sems can rnams sru dang / rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan
53b1(yum): pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin pa zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag
53b2(yum): gis bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa
53b3(yum): med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ci ltar byang chub sem
53b4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas/ sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
53b5(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis de/
53b6(yum): ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can rnams spyad do//
53b7(yum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
53b8(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad
54a1(yum): / 'di sad ston to// rigs kyi bu khyod chung shig yig gi mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis zhig/ yi ga gcig la mkhas par sa
54a2(yum): shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcun gnyis ts+tsha bar la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis zhig
54a3(yum): yi ge gnyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/
54a4(yum): yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgom shig ces chos ston to//
54a5(yum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bar la mkhas pa yin
54a6(yum): yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par ba/
54a7(yum): pa la mkhas pa yin te/ dede ltar mi ga mngan par gasgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa yin
54a8(yum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa
54b1(yum): yi ge mar po
54b2(yum): yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/
54b3(yum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
54b4(yum): thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha'
54b5(yum): las 'das pa dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs chos kyang mi dmigs chos kyang mi dmig
54b6(yum): chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das mi lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
54b7(yum): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
54b8(yum): dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhin dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod
54b9(yum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpal gyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
55a1(yum): na mamed pa mad de 'dzin dang/ stod pa byed pa byung ba 'dre la byung ba dang ba gyu ba brgyu la su ba dang /
55a2(yum): rjes gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgul spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bcu dang / so so yang dag par
55a3(yum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / sring rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
55a4(yum): dpe byang bzang po brgyad bcu la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston par lu
