95b7(yum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ dngos po med pa/
95b8(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyad pa med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi na
96a1(yum): / brnams pa dngas su spyod pa med do/ dbang po rnams pa yongs su spyod pa medado/ skabs rnams la yongasu spyad pa med do// byang chub kyi gan lag rnams pa
96a2(yum): yongs su spyod pa med do// phags pa'i ma yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyad pa med de// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ sam gtam
96a3(yum): bu yongs su spyod pa med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// bsamagan
96a4(yum): rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshad med pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam par
96a5(yum): thar pa brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i stobs par 'jug pa dgu la yongs su spyod pa med nga/ rnam par thar pa'i sti stong pa nyid dang mtshan
96a6(yum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yongs su spyad pa med do// mngon par shes pa rnams la gongs su spyod pa med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/
96a7(yum): rnams pa yangs su snad pa med// de bzhi na gshegs pa grungs baphrul sangs su spyod pa med de/ me dzegs pa pazhil long baspyang mi gsas rang dag pa sa papa
96a8(yum): ra srung pa med do/ byam m-i chen pa la yongasu srung ba med do/ sring rjeldan pa la songs srung po ring nga/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dzes pa bci brgyad la yangs su srung pa medang do/
96b1(yum): du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bul yongs su spyod pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spong pa med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongasu srung ba med do// dgra bcom pa/
96b2(yum): nyid la yongs su sbyong ba med do// rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs
96b3(yum): su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
96b4(yum): sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bsgom pa la rton kyang kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi
96b5(yum): 'gyur rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur la/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang mi gda' na/ lam bsgom du ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de na ci snyam du sems
96b6(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos pos la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba ldi 'khor ba na snang
96b7(yum): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos pa
96b8(yum): la zhig la brten ste/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par byed par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na ganga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po/
97a1(yum): ma gang yang ma mamasas/ s+yA s+yA sa sa smras ba sa rgya
97a2(yum): rtogs pa pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 'a
97a3(yum): thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
97a4(yum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// tshor ba thams cad ni sprul ba lta bu'o// 'du shes thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// 'du byed thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o//
97a5(yum): rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes thams
97a6(yum): nga ba sprul pa lta bu/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lnga grarnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags ma bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la ni gzugs mi mchis/ tshor ba mchis/
97a7(yum): 'dugs mamachis/ dang byed ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa mamachis/ rnam par byang ba mamachis/ gang las grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gra
97a8(yum): nga 'khor ba ma mchis na/ tsaM ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa// rabang byung de cig ma du sems/
97b1(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje 'jig ste
97b2(yum): nam/ lha'am mi dag las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir sems can gang yang dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan
97b3(yum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su dgrol bar
97b4(yum): bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so/ mthong ngo // rtogs so// sprul pa lta bur shes
97b5(yum): so/ mthong ngo // rtogs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal
97b6(yum): mthong ste rtogs la/ sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/ rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa spya
97b7(yum): pa lags/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod ma lags/ tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ mngon pa
97b8(yum): shes pa lnga la spyong ba lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ rnam par mthar bas
98a1(yum): // la spyod pa lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dgul stong ba lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mnan ma med pa'i dang
98a2(yum): smon pa med la stod pa lags/ ting rje 'dzin thams cad la sbyang ba lags/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa lags/ de bzhini gshegs pa'i stobs bcul stong pa
98a3(yum): mi dzegs pa ba zhal spyod pa lags/ so sa yang dag par rigs pa bzhi la spyong ba lags/ byams pa chen po la spyong ba lags// snying rjechen pa la stong pa ngas
98a4(yum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bci brgyad pa lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi bangal spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyis zhing yongs su dag pa
98a5(yum): bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams
98a6(yum): bang stsal bdags su ngani na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'ang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal ba grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i snang pa mi sto ni
98a7(yum): raba'i byung sems ca rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pag/ phrer mi shes pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par
98a8(yum): rol tu phyin pa drug la snyed de/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ rang 'byur gyis gsol pa/
98b1(yum): ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ mig yod lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams
98b2(yum): ci la gsum 'i sems dang 'dzin po shes rab kyi phadzin du sbyin byal snang byang san nga skyed 'drab kyang kA dus sbyi pa stsa
98b3(yum): rab 'byor sems can rnams ni mang rang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtagaso pa la gnas pas na/ byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi
98b4(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing de dag gi ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du bskyed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi ni gang nA lags mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom
98b5(yum): ldan ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming gis sgro btags pa'o// 'di lnga ste/ ming
98b6(yum): zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya'am/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes
98b7(yum): bya ba 'am/ bud med ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/ sems can dmyalwa ba zhes bya ba 'am/ byol song ga skye
98b8(yum): gnas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten po zhes bya ba 'am/ nal-I zhes bya ba 'am/ mi zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ma/ 'dus ma byas kyi tsha
99a1(yum): b+ha ba'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ lan cig phyir dong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'am/
99a2(yum): dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya 'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i ming gis sgo btags pa ste/ rab 'byor
99a3(yum): tshang ni thams cad ming gi btags pa te/ byis pas sa sti rnams gdul chags par 'gyur ba'i 'dus byas rnams cad ni ming rnam ste/ de dag la byang chub
99a4(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mang thams cad ni yongs su rdzog su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyis 'a
99a5(yum): su brtags pa dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi byed do// zhes skul
99a6(yum): bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa chi/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chis
99a7(yum): smon pa yin no// rab 'byor mtshams gang zhe na gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pas so'i spyi bo rnams gang la gtsigs par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhes ma/
99a8(yum): sa gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma'angs pa dang / daltar byung ba brdzun
99b1(yum): rags pa 'am/ bra ba'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig mA la kun tu rtog pas gzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtsha
99b2(yum): ma zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzugs pa'i med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na gzugs med pa'i chos gang la yang rung ste/ mtshan mar gzung bzhi yongs su brtags shing nyon mong/
99b3(yum): ba skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas
99b4(yum): pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o/ 'di ni mtshan med pa'o zhes bya ba
99b5(yum): gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thab
99b6(yum): mkhas pas sems can nams mtshan ma las rnam pa bkrol zhing mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su ra rab tu 'god do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di
99b7(yum): dag thams cad ni de tsam du bas te/ ming dang mtshan mar bas la gtags pa tsam tu bas te/ yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar bya
99b8(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thog sa la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad pa/
100a1(yum): / pa la gzhog cing dge ba'i rtsang de dgags sa nas yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum la sbyong ba lags/ bcom ldan
100a2(yum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal de dngos po 'am/ dngos po med pa'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
100a3(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chi/ khyad par thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang med/ dngos pa yang
100a4(yum): bas na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gang gyi ba rol du phyin pa
100a5(yum): yongs su dzubs par byud / mang mamed pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi ba rol tu phyin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mnan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brjod pa'i bar/
100a6(yum): byin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mnan ma med pa tshul gyis bsams
100a7(yum): bani yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshanam med pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
100a8(yum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis dang
100b1(yum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chang srung pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
100b2(yum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed
100b3(yum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su/
100b4(yum): rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
100b5(yum): par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/
100b6(yum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'das byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
100b7(yum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
100b8(yum): ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis thog ma
100b9(yum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
101a1(yum): // rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// canam med
101a2(yum): tshul gyis rang gi mnan cid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yangs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshanam med pa'i chus gyis
101a3(yum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul khrims kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ga
101a4(yum): nyid stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar brgyad yongs su rdzogs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mthur gyis gnas
101a5(yum): de'i rnams par 'jug pa dgu 'ongs su rdzogs pa byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhin yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshanam med pa'i tshul gyis rnam
101a6(yum): ba zang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa rlom gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yang sa rdzogs par byed /
101a7(yum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams ya su rdzogs par byed de// mtshan med pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de pas
101a8(yum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed de// mtshan ma med pa tshul gyis sos yang dag par
101b1(yum): rig pa bzhi yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs rdzogs pa'i bar byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan
101b2(yum): ma med pa tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos de dag yongasu rdzogs pa'i byas nas mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gnan yang dag na
101b3(yum): chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor gal te chung dran ska'i rtse mo che gas bzhag pacam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod na yang byang chub sems dpe' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye
101b4(yum): pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dran pa med pa yid la bya ba med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang zag pa med pa'i chos
101b5(yum): rnams la 'jog par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa dran pa med pa yid la bya ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' se/
101b6(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos
101b7(yum): thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing dran pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis ni/ bcom 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so 'di dag ni
101b8(yum): 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi
102a1(yum): / chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag na thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni
102a2(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ci ltar bzang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ra
102a3(yum): 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
102a4(yum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma ma med pa yang gzhan la/
102a5(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
102a6(yum): de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// na cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ phyir mi
102a7(yum): 'bras bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rang byang chub byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// de bar gshegs pa de de la
102a8(yum): sa bcom ldamadas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rabang byer rnam grangs des na di ltar chos thams cad de ni mtshan ma med par rig par byaste/ rab byor chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i
102b1(yum): laslob pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stod pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslob pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa ni
102b2(yum): bslob pa yin/ chen pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yim 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mtha' las las
102b3(yum): ba stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'das pa
102b4(yum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa
102b5(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par stong pa bzhi la slob pa yan
102b6(yum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yini/ stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i 'am yang lag brgyad
102b7(yum): ba la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ stongs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi 'phabs pa'i 'ded pa nil slob pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa 'im tsham
102b8(yum): ba bani la slob pa yin gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhil slob pa yin/ rnam par thar brgyad la slob pa yin mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul sngom
104a1(yum): ngam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshanam med pa dang / ston pa med pa la slob pa yan/ mngon par shes pa lnga la slob payin// nga ma
104a2(yum): cad la slob pa pan/ gzungs kyi sgoms cad la sgrub pa yin/ rje bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sgrub pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa sla pa sam/ sa ya
104a3(yum): par rig pa bzhi la skyob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa sam/ lam khye
104a4(yum): pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems
104a5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang ba'i chi// bar lon pa'i bo lA la stob pa yin lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
104a6(yum): rang tshur la byang chung sems dpa' sam so nga na lU paral tu phyin pa la dang ba / d+hags rang tugs te/ gadrugs snar sgru ba
104a7(yum): gzugs ci ltar 'gag pa dang / bzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ci lta bu yin pa rab du shes so// de la tsa ltar ni gzugs shes pa ya zhe na/ 'di lta ste dpar
104a8(yum): nang du bang phreng pa snying po meng pa stang shin tu gas sa ldang paman tu ba se chags dang / shin tu snang po med par da suM shes pa n+ti n+ya/ c-i gar gzugs shes pa
104b1(yum): yin no// ci ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhen/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'os
104b2(yum): gang tu yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gud tu yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar gzugs kyi skye bu dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ci ltar na gzugs kyi
104b3(yum): de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/
104b4(yum): bam yin 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin du gzhan du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa
104b5(yum): yin no// tsa ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tsher ba shes pa yin no/ ci ltar na chod
104b6(yum): skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tsheng ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang tu yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang tu yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa
104b7(yum): dIgang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ci ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor bar de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag
104b8(yum): 'odong ba med 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par bya ba ma yin/ bri ba ma yin 'phel ba yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin du gnas pa skye
105a1(yum): de'i phyir de bzhin nyid zhes bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba di bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ci ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na smig rgyu la chu shin du med ni/
105a2(yum): pa ltang shes pa ste/ de ltar 'du shes shes pa yan ni/ ci ltar 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba maud gang du yang 'gro
105a3(yum): pa med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang nas kyang mi 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin
105a4(yum): no// ci ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/ kun nas mongs pa ma yin/ rnam
105a5(yum): par byung ba ma yin/ brib ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ byin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na
105a6(yum): 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// cig ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na chu shing shing shun pa so sor phyen snyed bshin tu mi dmyig pa ltar
105a7(yum): shes pa ste/ de d+hA n+ya du byed rnams shes pa yin mo ci ltar ma du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin na ni/ dang byed ni gung nas kyang ji med cid/ / gro pa mi
105a8(yum): gang nas kyang mang gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa 'o gang tu ma sang bar shes pa ste/ de stor 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig shes pa 'i rnamamams
105b1(yum): byed bkye de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye ma 'gag/ 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa mu yim rnam par byang ba ma yin
105b2(yum): ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yini zhing de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/
105b3(yum): na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin
105b4(yum): no/ ci ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'dzag pa shes pa'i yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang tu yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gdutu
105b5(yum): yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang tu yang ma 'ong ba'i shes pa ste/ de ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa yin no// ci ltar rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
105b6(yum): nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byad pa ma yin/
105b7(yum): bri ba phyin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di bzhin
105b8(yum): pa yin no// ci ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams ni kyis stong ngo // phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong pa
106a1(yum): // nga ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa ste/ bai ltar na khams rnams shes pa lani zhen/ mag ga khams kyang myig sa khams kyi rang brna
106a2(yum): stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
106a3(yum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes
106a4(yum): ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / khams kyang dri
106a5(yum): rnams rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo do// lce khams kyang lce khams kyir

106a8(yum): pams kya sa kyi ma pa gas papa 'ams tshang ba'i kyi dngang sa kyil ma ma kyi sa
106b1(yum): khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
106b2(yum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // zhes bya bar shes pa ste// de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no// ci ltar na rten 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa yin zhem rten cing 'brel
106b3(yum): 'byung ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten bcing 'brel bar/ 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa mtshan
106b4(yum): pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa yin no// ci ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa
106b5(yum): rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'grus pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pas bden pa shes pa yi/
106b6(yum): ci ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa la ni/ gnyis las rnam
106b7(yum): par grol ba 'bigs pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog
106b8(yum): gro bI lam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin me de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no// ci ltar ni sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa ma men chen/ sngun
107a1(yum): / bsngal gyi de bzhin da man bzhes bya ba shes pa na/ de bzhin dugun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi bzhin d+he kyang rab tugs pa yi nA~M/ de nas
107a2(yum): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lag tod lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha yorol tu phyin pa la snang
107a3(yum): ngan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de lhur 'tshal na/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par du grags par mi 'gyur ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal
107a4(yum): kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni rnam par bkrugs par yang 'gyur te// rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so/
107a5(yum): gal te dmigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dkrugs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhini gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dang 'a'am/ rangs
107a6(yum): rgyus snyam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis chos ci dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i tshig gang yang ma dmigs pa/ de ltar mi migs pas chos kyi dbyings yar
107a7(yum): mdags pa ci sdugan na// sa b+ha dgas ba zad de/ rang byed / na byang chubasams dpang sems dpa chen pa la kyi dang phyin pa pa snang bas ma

107b1(yum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad la skabs par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
107b2(yum): rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags bcom ldan 'das kyi
107b3(yum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/ dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin drug
107b4(yum): ba ste/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de ni 'di lta ste dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i tshe/
107b5(yum): dang / kha na ma tho ba'i dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tha ba med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
107b6(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mchos kyi dbyings la slob pas chos thams cad la bsgrubs par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te tshe/
107b7(yum): thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ci ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/
107b8(yum): hUM ltar tshong ba la bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ tswi ltar 'du byed la bslang bar bgyi/ tsA ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ tsA ltar khams rnams
108a1(yum): smra sa smra smra smra / smra na

108a4(yum): byinang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ hUM ltar stong pa nyid stong parjid la bslab par ga bgyi/ ci ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ tsA ltar ngo ngam pa stong pa nyid/

108a7(yum): ba la bslab cad la bslab par bgyi/ tsA ltar chos thams cad snang brjid la bslab par bgyi/ tsA lta rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ tsA ltar ma'i
108a8(yum): mastong pa ba la 'asu pa sa/ kyi bar dris pa rang bskang pa 'ang mas papar / ris nang pa'i mangs sa kyi/ na pas pa ya
108b1(yum): nyid la bslab par gyi/ ci ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ tsA ltar rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi langs
108b2(yum): bar bgyi/ TI ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ tsA ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ tsA ltar 'phags

108b6(yum): bslab par bgyi/ tswi ltar mngon par shes pa drug la bsrab par bag+h+nAM/ tsA ltar ting nge 'dzin thams la bsrabs bgyi/ ci ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bsdus
108b7(yum): bar bgyi/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs skyabs bcu la bsgrub par bgyi/ ci ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ hU~M ltar sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la
108b8(yum): bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ tsA ltar snying sa rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ tswi ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi/ tswi
109a1(yum): rnams sa pal ba pa / sa rnas
109a2(yum): gnyis dang / ying pe byed bzang po brgyad bcu yongs su sgrub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mthaba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslob bgyi
109a3(yum): ltar bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab 'ang bgyi/ rje ltar khyim bdag che zhing mthoba'i su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab bar bgyi/ tsA sna
109a4(yum): chen pa'i ris kyi lcar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ tsiltar sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ljang skye bar gyi bal bslab par bgyi/ te ltar mche ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la

109a7(yum): sa pa na sa n+d+he lda skye ts+tsha ba la slam par ba ts+tsha cho na da skye bar babyub ba sla pa ban+d+he/ tsA nga nu chung kyi shAr sgra gyi ba pa
109a8(yum): pe ma byeb g+h+nAM A ku bye kya 'i 'dra ba // rnaMs chung ba pa dbye pa'i ma pa kyi
109b1(yum): dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar dge rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar chung che'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi// N+Di ltar tshad mi
109b2(yum): che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bsrab par bgyi/ tswi ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar ba skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ sI ltar 'du shes mod pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba'i bslang du bsra
109b3(yum): bar bgyi/ tsI ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ tswi ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab ci
109b4(yum): der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ci ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ci ltar cung zad med pa'i rgyu skye bar bgyi ba la bskas

109b7(yum): ci ltar sems bskyed pa lnga ba la bslab par bgyi/ tswi ltar sems skyed pa drug pa la bslab par gyi/ ci ltar sems skyed pa bdun pa la bslab par bgyi/ ci lta sems skyed pa/
109b8(yum): brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ tswi ltar sems skyed pa dgu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar sems skyed pa bcu pa la bsrab par bgyi/ tswi ltar nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par babya/
110a1(yum): ya dadas sa rgyas byas pa bsgru ba zlas/ chubs pa dang smras durnas pa la ba ga / ska mams can mas su
110a2(yum): bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar byang chub kyi yolam la bslab shing chos thams cad rnam pa tham
110a3(yum): cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub lam la bslab pa bgyi// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas brgyu
110a4(yum): la skabs par bgyi/ tshwar ba la bslab par bgyi/ 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pAl bslab par bgyi/ mig la bsgrub par
110a5(yum): rnam la bslab par bgyi/ snal bslab par bag+h+nAM/ sbrul bslab par bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yad la bslab par gyi/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ sprul
110a6(yum): bslab par badz+ra/ dril bsgrib par bag+sa/ ril bas pa par dargya/ rigal bslab pa bag+h+na/ tsas la bas pa par bgyi/ ma ge rnam par shes pal bas pas
110a7(yum): rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslang bar bgyi/ lha rnam par shes pa la bslab par brtse/ bras kyi rnam pa nus pa la bsdu
110a8(yum): pang gyi ya cirnam pa gas pas pas bar ba gyi/ mag ga sa ga pam rna par / rna dus rig rnas pa pa kyi dus rig pas ba
110b1(yum): bar bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
110b2(yum): gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi// 'dus te reg pa'i
110b3(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyigs
110b4(yum): khams la bslab par bgyi/ chu'i khams la bslab paragyi/ me'i khams la bsrab par bgyi/ rlung gyi khams la bslab par bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams la bslab par gyi/
110b5(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ming dang gzugs la/
110b6(yum): bslab par bgyi/ skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/ reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sred pa la bslab par bgyi/ len pa la bslab par bgyi/
110b7(yum): srid pa la bslab par bgyi/ skye ba la bslab bgyi/ rga shi la bslab par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin la bslab sa/
110b8(yum): bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin la bslab par
111a1(yum): bgyi/ shes rab kyi pa ral tu phyin pa la bsla' par bgyi/ rang snang pa da la bslab par brgya/ gyi snang bcad la bslab par bgyi/ byi nang snang pa
111a2(yum): bsrab par bgyi/ spyod pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab bar bgyi/ yang ma da snang ba nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus byas snang
111a3(yum): la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus ma byas snang pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 'di la bslab par bgyi/ zug ma dang tha ma med pa snang ba
111a4(yum): la bslab par bgyi/ don dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par gyi/ rang gyi bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang gyi mtshan
111a5(yum): stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ nges pa med pa stong banyid la bslab par 'gyi/ nga babang stong panyid la bslab par bye/ rnas pa'i/
111a6(yum): nga nga bo di stong pa 'ad la bsnang bar bgyi dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnam la bsgrub par bgyi / rdzu phul gyi nang pa rnams pa bdab par bgyi/ nga sa
111a7(yum): rnams pa srab par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bsrab par ba gyi/ byang chub kyi phan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i la ngan lag brdung pa la bsgrub par bgyi/ 'gas pa'i
111a8(yum): bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams
111b1(yum): la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa
111b2(yum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi/ bzungs gi sgo
111b3(yum): la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab
111b4(yum): par bgyi/ byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bslab par bgyi/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab
111b5(yum): bar bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la bslab
111b6(yum): bgyi/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems/
111b7(yum): dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa 'am/ mi spro ba bsgos par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags bgrang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa dum bu bcu gnyi
111b8(yum): pa/ bam po gnyi brgya brgyad du bya gnyis// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi
112a1(yum): ma lags gzugs las gu na rang chos kyi byings ma mchis/ bzugs cad kyang chos kyi dbyings sa/ a tsa dbyings ci kyang gzugs pa/ nga ba
112a2(yum): dkyis ma lags/ ra ba gran pa sa ny-i gyis ma mchis/ chos kyi kyis kyang tshor bas/ 'dus cang tshas cad sa pa 'gas gas pas sungs
112a3(yum): rjes kyi dbyangs ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings sa/ chos kyi dbyings 'di kyang 'dushes pa/ 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/

112a7(yum): sangs pa/ rnaMs kying zungs na dag/ ga nas rgyas ma lags/ sngalas dun

112a9(yum): ma sun ma chos kyi byes ma mched te/ bya sa kyi

113a1(yum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyis

114a8(yum): kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus
114b1(yum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las dgud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings
114b2(yum): nyid lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma las/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
114b3(yum): ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'ad te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te/
114b4(yum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang chos dbyings

114b6(yum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ me'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ me'i kham
114b7(yum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i kham so// rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rlung gi khams las dgud na
114b8(yum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// ma mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nam
115a1(yum): / ma pa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings pa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//

115a3(yum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i mkham so// ma rig pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
115a4(yum): mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos

115a6(yum): grang na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa cad kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnams par shes pag meng dang gzugs kya sa kyi
115a7(yum): ma lags/ ming dang gzungs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs ste mched
115a8(yum): drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye mched drug las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang smre drug go
115b1(yum): reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba/
