115b7(yum): yang chos kyi dbyings mu la glos
115b8(yum): na nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings pa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgagag/ sbyin pa'i ba'i pha rol tu phyin yang rdzas kyi dbyings sa ma logs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las
115b9(yum): na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi
116a1(yum): ral tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags tshul khrims kyi pha ral tu phyin pa las gun yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i/
116a2(yum): sa kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pa rab tu rab tu sbyin pa/ bzeng shA ral tu phyin pa yang rgyas kyi dargyas ma lags/ bzod pa
116a3(yum): tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu
116a4(yum): pa'o/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gun yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gang na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchi
116a5(yum): te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
116a6(yum): ba yang chos kyi dbyings pam lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha ral tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu dran pa
116a7(yum): da kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gan gyi pha rol tu phyin pag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang sa ci dbyings ma lags/ shes ra
116a8(yum): kyipha ral tu phyin pa pas gung na yang chos kyi tshangs ma mdzes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings sa/ chos kyi dbyings ca mas
116b1(yum): rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mang ba stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi
116b2(yum): so chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi ba stong pa nyid las gud na yang ches kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang
116b3(yum): chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyis dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi
116b4(yum): dbyings ma mchis te/ byi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stong pa nyid sto
116b5(yum): pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyi
116b6(yum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid las kun+da yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te chen po stong pa nyid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po snang
116b7(yum): pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang tsha
116b8(yum): dbyed so// chos kyi dbyis nyid kyang don dam pa stong nyid do// dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus byas stong ba nyis las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
117a1(yum): / 'dus byas snang ba kyang sa kyi sbyangasas/ rgyas kyi dkyis cad kyapa dus byas snang ba byed do/ 'dum pa kyang byung ba nyid kyang chos kya dbyings ma lags/ 'a
117a2(yum): byas stong pa nyid las rgyu na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis sa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do//
117a3(yum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bkyang chos dbyings ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mtha' las 'das ba
117a4(yum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma 'gas thog ma dang tha ma med
117a5(yum): bstong ba nyid las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thub ma dang ma med pas
117a6(yum): panyid do/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings lags/ dor ba med pa sring ba nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ der ba med pa stong ban kya
117a7(yum): kyi rjes sams kyis dbyis nyid kyang dong ba med pa nyid do/ rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags rang bzhin snang bzed las gung na yang rjes kyi phyi
117a8(yum): mas ga ba gang pani byang rdzas kyi dbyas / sa kya dkyis nyi kyang ra na sang pa cid pa cas thams cad snang ba ca sa kyi rgyamam#
117b1(yum): mi sa#
117b2(yum): thams cad stong pa nyid las dgud na yang chos kyis dbyings ma mchis te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyis dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid
117b3(yum): do rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings mchis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi
117b4(yum): dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos
117b5(yum): kyis dbyings ma la ni sa/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
117b6(yum): ma lags// dngos po med pa stong tha nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang ches gyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos
117b7(yum): med pa stong pa nyid do// de bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gang na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong/
117b8(yum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags// dngos po med
117b9(yum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nga
118a1(yum): / po med pa'i bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gya chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam las gud na yang chos kyi
118a2(yum): dbyings ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so// yang dag d+hA par spong ba rnam
118a3(yum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyis ma mchis te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
118a4(yum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang
118a5(yum): chos kyi dbyings mchis te/ rdugs 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyes nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po rnam
118a6(yum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dbang po rnams las gud na yang chos dbyings ma mchis te/ dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
118a7(yum): nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te// stobs nyid
118a8(yum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos dbyings ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag/
118b1(yum): rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi phan lag rnams
118b2(yum): lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang chos dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo/ 'phags
118b3(yum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma legs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden/
118b4(yum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dpying ma lags/ bsams
118b5(yum): rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa rnams kyang chos kyi
118b6(yum): dbyings ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyis dbyings ma mchis te/ tshad med pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings so chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang can
118b7(yum): med pa rnams so// gzugs med po'i stoHsa par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gudan
118b8(yum): yang chos dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i se/
119a1(yum): par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam
119a2(yum): thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
119a3(yum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos
119a4(yum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par bathar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang sman pa
119a5(yum): pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa las dgud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar
119a6(yum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par rngam pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang /
119a7(yum): sman pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang ches kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mngon par shes/
119a8(yum): bzed kyang blanas so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnam so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gungan pal/
119b1(yum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgra rnams kyang chos kyi dkying
119b2(yum): ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings su/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang /
119b3(yum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
119b4(yum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyi
119b5(yum): ma mchis de mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnam so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ soso
119b6(yum): yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig par nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so
119b7(yum): dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byams pa chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos
119b8(yum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ snying rje chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
120a1(yum): / steng rje chen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings sa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snang rje chen pong/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
120a2(yum): lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings pa/
120a3(yum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang chas kyi dbyings ma lags/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bulas gu
120a4(yum): na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras pa'o// lan
120a5(yum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bru bu yang chos kyi dbyings mi lags/ lan cig b+hir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang / chos kyi dbyings mi mchis te/ lan cig phyir 'ja
120a6(yum): 'bras so bu nyid kyang len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phy-ir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gung na
120a7(yum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byar ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ches kyi dbyings sa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byer mi 'ang ba'i 'bras bu'o//
120a8(yum): bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
120a9(yum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
120b1(yum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// nga byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chu
120b2(yum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid las dgun yang
120b3(yum): chos kyi dbyangs ma mchis te/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang las gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do//
120b4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kun yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
120b5(yum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin
120b6(yum): / ci skad du smras pa de bzhin no// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
120b7(yum): nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed/
120b8(yum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go// rna
121a1(yum): sa.Ats+tsha sa g+sa tshungs sa snun snru satsas
121a2(yum): snyi byings nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings pa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings sa// chos kyi dbyings nyid 'ad de/ gzugs nyid kya
121a3(yum): skyid sa so chos kyi gyis nyi kyang bajugs su nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi das da kyang skrag nyid kyang tsas kyi dbyangs // nas kya byings nyid kyang dupar nyid
121a4(yum): chos kyi dbyings// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rog/ reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi reg go// chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so// mig gi/
121a5(yum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pasgo/ rnam pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam
121a6(yum): pang shes pago / sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna rnam pa shes pa la lce rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyi
121a7(yum): nyid kyang khre'i rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings rnyed kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yin kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyeng sa nyid/
121a8(yum): kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings sa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi
121b1(yum): so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi chos kyang dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang na ba'i 'dus/
121b2(yum): te reg pakra/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos
121b3(yum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te/
121b4(yum): reg pa'o/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyang dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi
121b5(yum): dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
121b6(yum): ng+ge kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus /
121b7(yum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba'o// lce'i 'du te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg
121b8(yum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cho
122a1(yum): / nyid kyang chos kyi byed so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyed nyid kyang sa na
122a2(yum): khamapo/ chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so//
122a3(yum): rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dpyid nyid kyi
122a4(yum): nam mkha'i khamaso rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// ches kyi
122a5(yum): dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pasgo/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
122a6(yum): kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mi dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
122a7(yum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings /
122a8(yum): kya tshong ba'i sred pa nyid kyang chos kyis kyi dbying sa chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa ga sring pa nyid kyi
122b1(yum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gasrid pago skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o/ rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
122b2(yum): nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
122b3(yum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyes nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ brtson
122b4(yum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
122b5(yum): chos kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbying nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
122b6(yum): dngo nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyung po/ chos kyi dbyed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bye stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbying / chos dbyings nyid kyang kyi stong pa nyid do// bye nang spyod pa ni byung nas
122b7(yum): ngas/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi
122b8(yum): dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dmapa/
123a1(yum): stong pa nyid do// 'dus byang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyang chos kyi dbyings so chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ dus ma dus stong pa nyid kya chod kyi dbyas
123a2(yum): tshod kying shA kyang 'dus ma byas snang banyid po mdzad pas 'das bstong brjid kyang rgyas kyi smras pa/ rjes kyi byings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid po dzangam
123a3(yum): dang tha ma med pa stong pad kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tha~M nang bsrung banyid do// dong bamang ba stong pa nyid kyang cho kyi dbyangs
123a4(yum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings sa/ chos kyi dbyingos nyid kyang rang bzhin stong ba
123a5(yum): tsha thams cad snang ba 'ad kyang chos kyi dbyings su chos kyi dbyings ny-id kyang chos thams cang stong pa nyid/ rang ga mtshan nyid snang pa nyid kya
123a6(yum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings sa/
123a7(yum): dbyings so nyid kyang mi dam sopa stong pa nyid do/ dngos po meng bstong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po
123a8(yum): bgang ba nyid ma ngang bang snang ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs pa/ rjes kyi datshungs nyid kyang ngadzi ny-ing song ba ba dngas pa meng ba ba
123b1(yum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
123b2(yum): dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams
123b3(yum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rka pa rnams so// dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
123b4(yum): dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang
123b5(yum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam lhag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings su/
123b6(yum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
123b7(yum): ba'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams sa/ tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
123b8(yum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i ston
124a1(yum): par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis
124a2(yum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs sa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sa/ rnam par thar
124a3(yum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa yang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
124a4(yum): smin pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbying
124a5(yum): chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgond kyang chos kyi dbyangs so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzungs kyi sgra rnams
124a6(yum): de banan gshegs pa'i snangs rgyud kyang chas kyid byings pa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snangs rnams so/ ma dzugs pa nyid
124a7(yum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams/ sa so yang dag par rig pa rnyed kyang nus kyi dbyangs sa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang smras yang dag pa
124a8(yum): rig pa rnams sa/ byams pa chen po nyid cad chos po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings sa/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen pal/ snying rje chen pa/
124b1(yum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
124b2(yum): dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyu
124b3(yum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kying chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'dres
124b4(yum): dru'i/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
124b5(yum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/ rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo//
124b6(yum): lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
124b7(yum): kyang chos dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
124b8(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni bla na med pa yang dag pa
125a1(yum): / rdugs pa'i byung chub la gnas par yang ma 'gyur// ches thams cad na chos kyang dbyangs yin ngas pa'i phying byang chub sems dpa' sanas
125a2(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa ral tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma/ nas thams cad chos kyi dbyangs su shes nas/ chos thams cad mkhyen pa la mang gi ba
125a3(yum): chos ston te/ 'di ni gzugs shes byan/ 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du shes zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o/ 'di
125a4(yum): ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni mig ces byab/ 'dini rna ba zhes byag/ 'di na sA zhes byag/ 'di ni wu zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus zhes bya
125a5(yum): dang ni yid ces b+hAH/ 'ad ni gzugs shes b+haH/ 'di ni sgra zhes byab/ 'di ni dri zhes bya'o/ 'di na ro zhes bya'o/ 'dren rag ces bya/
125a6(yum): ni ches zhes d+ha'i/ 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ 'di na na bu'i rnam par shes pa zlas bya/ da~Mn+di sna rnam pa shas
125a7(yum): bya'o// 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes bya/ 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//
125a8(yum): ni mag gi 'dugs te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshu
125b1(yum): 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// di ni myig gi 'dug te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
125b2(yum): tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i
125b3(yum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi
125b4(yum): tshur zhes bya'o/ 'di ni sa'i khams zhes bya'o/ 'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni me'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni rlung gi khams zhes bya'o//
125b5(yum): ni nam mkha'i khams shes bya'o/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya'o// 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o// 'di ni rnam
125b6(yum): bar shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni mang dang gzugs shes bya'o/ 'di ni skye mched drug ces bya'o// 'di ni reg pa zhes b+hA'o/ 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya/
125b7(yum): 'di ni sred pa zhes bya'o/ 'di ni ming len pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni che na pa zhes b+hA'i/ 'di ni skye ba zhes bya'o// 'di na rga shi zhes bya'o// 'di ni sbyin pa
125b8(yum): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'din brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
126a1(yum): sbyin pa shes bya'o// 'di na pasamagatan gyib la du sbyin pa / spyong na
126a2(yum): nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni stong pa nyid stong panyid ces bya'o// 'din chen po stong pa nyid ces d+haro//
126a3(yum): 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa sring
126a4(yum): nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med bsnang pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dror ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o//
126a5(yum): ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni ngo bo nyid sto
126a6(yum): pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di dag ni dran pa nye bar banag pa bzhi rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni yang dag
126a7(yum): par spong ba rnams shes bya'o// yang nga 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni dbang po rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni spongs rnam/
126a8(yum): zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya'o// 'ji dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gang pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni dbang pa rnams shes bya
126b1(yum): 'di dag ni sngo bas rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// 'dang /
126b2(yum): ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni tshad med pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni gzugs med pa
126b3(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o// 'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// 'di
126b4(yum): dgra ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni ting nge
126b5(yum): 'dzin rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa
126b6(yum): rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di dag ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// 'di
126b7(yum): dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'di
126b8(yum): dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'di dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di dag ni rang byang chub ces bya'o// 'di dag ni lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ces
127a1(yum): drug/ 'di dag ni blan med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa byung chu sa rgyan ldan/ bu 'byu 'dis byer na sgrupa ga 'dab many+dzu
127a2(yum): byed pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis rdzas kyi rnam pa byin zhig la rten te/ gzugs kyi bye brog sna tshogs 'di lta ste glang po che'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sa/
127a3(yum): ba lang gi gzugs sam/ rnga mong dang lug gi gzugs sam/ skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu me'i gzugs sam/ skyed mos 'tshal dang gzhil med/
127a4(yum): khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga'i rab mdangs dga' ba'am/ rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba 'am/ nags tshal mdangs dga' bdag sprul cing de
127a5(yum): dag tu stan dang 'khor gyi sman dang gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs 'ding ste/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang spyan gzigs zhim pa
127a6(yum): dag bstan tam/ glu dang sil sman gyis skye bo dga' bar byas sam/ sbyin pa yongs su bdang ngam/ tshul khrims srung ngam/ bzod pa posgrub pa'am/ brtson
127a7(yum): brtsom pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rje ba'am/ shes rab sgom pa 'am/ rnam pa de lta bu dag gi ste 'i dga' bar byas te/ rgyal rigs chen dmu rje
127a8(yum): rigs pastan dam/ bram ze che ning mtho ba'i rigs 'gran tam/ khyim bdag che ring ma'i ba'i rigs bsan dam/ re po bstan dam/ rgyal chen 'anim
127b1(yum): kyi lha rnams bstan dam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bstan dam/ mche ma'i lha rnams bstan dam/ dga' ldan gyi sa zla sa na dam/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
127b2(yum): bstan tram/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs ris lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs pa kun
127b3(yum): 'khor gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ snang dang ba'i lha rnams bsnan tam/ dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung dge'i lha rnam
127b4(yum): baspyan tam/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung che'i lha rnams bstan dam/
127b5(yum): tshad med che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'bras bu che ba'i rnams bstan tam/ mi che ba'i lha'i rnams bstan tam/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ shin
127b6(yum): tu mtho ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'ogra min gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnam
127b7(yum): bsun tam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi sde ba stan tam/ 'dushes med 'du shes med min sku
127b8(yum): mched kyi lha gzugs med pa rnams bstan tam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong bar dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rangs
128a1(yum): / rgyus mang ba bstan ma/ byang chub sems dpanga' sems pa chen 'a sa sa byud nas na
128a2(yum): byan pa nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa dang / bzong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa la dang / badren 'grus kyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang / zas
128a3(yum): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong bzhid la sbyong ba dang / phyi nang spyong
128a4(yum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong panyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
128a5(yum): la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa spong ba nyi la spyod pa nga
128a6(yum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la skyid bzhid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyong ba dang / chos thams cad stong ba srid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
128a7(yum): spong bzhi la spyod pa dang / mau dmigs pa sring pa zhid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa song pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo yid stong po nyid la spyong ba dang / dngos
128a8(yum): me pa dzi'i 'ongs du dang / dran bar nag pa rnam mil byed ba dang / yang na pa slong nga rnams maspyad pa dang / rdzu 'bru byenang rnams la myong bas
128b1(yum): dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / sabs rnams la skrod pa dang / byang chub kyi man lag rnams la stong pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pa la spyong ba dang / ma/
128b2(yum): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzog
128b3(yum): par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug
128b4(yum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
128b5(yum): pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa
128b6(yum): dag gis rnam par rtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang ba byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
128b7(yum): byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag yongs su dag par byed pa dang / spyod par dka' ba'i spyad par bye skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su
128b8(yum): sgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams su sgrub pa dang / so so yang dag por rig pa rnams yongs su slob pa dang / sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub
129a1(yum): pa dang / byams pa chen po yongs su sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po yang ra sgrub pa bad+yAn+na d+hamA/ sangs rgyas kyi su man la ga
129a2(yum): lag thams cad yongs rdzogs par bstan na/ de la sems can byis pa ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma mi 'dis legs par srab pa ngo mtshar che'o//
129a3(yum): re mdzes dag byed de dag skye bo dga' bar byed cing gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs dang / rta'i gzugs dang / baglang grang gi gzugs dang
129a4(yum): rnga mA lug gi gzugs dang / skyes pa dang bud med kyi gzugs ston pa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / zhal med khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga'i
129a5(yum): ba mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / de dag tu stan dang 'khor gyi stan dang gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang
129a6(yum): spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs mang po de lta bu ston pa dang / glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /
129a7(yum): tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa bsgru pa dang / brjor 'grus rtsom pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / shes rab kyo sdom pa dang / rnam pa dengs
129a8(yum): gis skye bo dga'i bar byed cing rgyal rigs che ning mtho ba'i rigs spor pa dang / bram mo che ni mtho 'i ri rigs ston pa dang / khyim bdas me ning mtho ba'i rigs sun
129b1(yum): ba dang / ri ra ba ston pa dang / rgyal chen bani'i rigs kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams son pa dang / mchim rIH rnams ston pa dang / dga' na
129b2(yum): gyi lnga rnams ston pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rtswa rnams ston pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lnga rnams ston pa dang / tshangs
129b3(yum): nye bar gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lga rnams ston pa dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / rlung snang gi
129b4(yum): lha rnams stod pa dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / rlung dge'i lha rnams smon pa dang / chang med dge ba'i lha rnams ston
129b5(yum): ba dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung che'i lnga rnams ston pa dang / chad med che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / 'bras bu che ba'i
129b6(yum): lha rnams ston pa dang / mi che ba'i lnga rnams ston pa dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / bya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
129b7(yum): ston pa dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa
129b8(yum): dpe cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams ston pa dang
130a1(yum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams pon cing byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
130a2(yum): chen po rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi ba la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i tha
130a3(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
130a4(yum): bal spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dri snying ba nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong bzhi la spyod pa dang / spong ba nyid song ba nyid la spyod pa dang / chen
130a5(yum): bo stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa spong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha'
130a6(yum): las 'das pa spong ba stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog mo dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong
130a7(yum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad spyod pa cing la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid spong ba cid la spyod pa dang / mi dmyigs kyi phreng ba 'ad la sbyong ba dang
130a8(yum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid sdong po 'angang spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spong ba dang / dran pa nye bar ba 'ag
130b1(yum): brnams la skrong ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la skyed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bskyed pa dang / dbang po rnams la skyed pa dang / khyims tshu
130b2(yum): la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar po dang /
130b3(yum): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par bye ba dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa
130b4(yum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug po yongs su rdzogs par
130b5(yum): byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa
130b6(yum): bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bslab pa dang / mngon par
130b7(yum): shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtsa ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
130b8(yum): zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang zhing la g.yongs su gtong ba dang / dka' ba'i spyad pa'i spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
131a1(yum): yongs su rdzogs sgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /
131a2(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yong su sgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag kyang ston cing sangs
131a3(yum): rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs su rdzogs pa ston pa ni ngo mchir che zhes bya ngo mtshar cher 'dzin to// de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal
131a4(yum): ba yid rno ba dang ldan pa spyod pa dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni 'di snyam ste/ 'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na/ mi 'di ltar med pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po
131a5(yum): 'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so sam ste/ sems can 'di dag ni dngos po med pa'i dngos por 'du shes pa'o zhes bya bar de dag
131a6(yum): shes pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyeng/
131a7(yum): sum gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can mo dmigs te/ bdag kyi
131a8(yum): sems can du bdags pa dang yang mi dmigs te/ bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ sbyin pa'i leg
131b1(yum): pa badzad pa yin/ sems can ga'an gang sbyin pa gtang ba dag so legs par 'arjod bcing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag
131b2(yum): bsrung ba yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi legs par brjod pa min/ sems can gzhan yang gang tshul khrims srung
131b3(yum): bde dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bzod bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin
131b4(yum): bzod pa'i legs par 'arjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang brjon

131b6(yum): brtson pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin
131b7(yum): yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi legs par brjod po yin/ sems can gnan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing
131b8(yum): 'thun pas dga' bar sdod pa yin/ bdag kyang shes rabasgom pa yin/ gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par skul ba yin/ shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin//
132a1(yum): #sems can gzhan gang shes rab rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bor min/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam

132a3(yum): gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjerjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ sems can bdag kyang yan lag brgyad
132a4(yum): dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar banas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso
132a5(yum): sbyin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gcan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar banas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar
132a6(yum): spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ngasdang ba'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhar yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par bskur ba yin/ bslab pa'i gnas
132a7(yum): lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa
132a8(yum): yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gdan dang po la yang dag par skul yin/ bsam gtan dang po'i legs
132b1(yum): pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang /

133a1(yum): dag gi brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ 'dag kyang snying rje chen po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje la yang

133a7(yum): dag par skul ba yin/ nam mi'i'i mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchod la snyoms

133b1(yum): gzhan yang rnam zhes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan

136a7(yum): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dpe byung ba bang po brgyad bcu /

136b1(yum): gzhan gang dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod pa cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings

136b3(yum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston par mi 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed

136b5(yum): de bzhin pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tha bos mkhas pas sems can
136b6(yum): rnams la chos dbyings ston to// sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/

136b8(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum bu bcu gnyis pa/ be mo po gnyis brgya gyi bcu gya gsum pa// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
137a1(yum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de lta gal te sems can yang shin tu dmigs su ma mchis la/
137a2(yum): sems can du dmigs pa yang ma mchis na/ su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa lags/
137a3(yum): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pato// rab 'byor byang chub sems
137a4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshang mar byas zhing zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste/ rab 'byor gal to yang dge pa'i mtha'
137a5(yum): yang gzhan la sems can gyi mtha' yang gnan zhig yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ya shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom du
137a6(yum): mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin/ sems can gyi mtha' gzhan ma yin pas/ de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sa
137a7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la snyam pa'i byung
137a8(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mthar rnam par 'jug pa med pa sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mdza'i lang mod de/ gsos
137b1(yum): bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag /
137b2(yum): pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur na ni rang bzhin la rang
137b3(yum): bzhin gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin la ni rang bzhin gnas pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
137b4(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la dgod pa legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'//
137b5(yum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la yod dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba yang med/ rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba yang
137b6(yum): med na/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi
137b7(yum): yang dag pa'i mtha' la dgod de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ yang
137b8(yum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar na sems can gyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// gsol pa
138a1(yum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas padab rngan/
138a2(yum): byas sems can rnams yang dge pa'i mtha' la 'gred kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi byed pa de lta du ba bas gang lags/ bcom ldan
138a3(yum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ sems dang po skyed pa na/
138a4(yum): nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do// sbyin pa la rab tu bkod nas/ sbyin pa de thog ma'i mtha' dang tha ma'i mtha' dang dbus ston te/
138a5(yum): ci ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' yang spring / tha ma'i mtha' yang spong / dbus kyang spong ba de lta ba'i 'bras bu yang stong / sbyin bdag kyang spong / len pa ya
138a6(yum): stong par stong cing rigs kyi bu de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag gis sbyin pa yang gzhan la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang song // sbyin bdag kyang spong / len pa
138a7(yum): yang stong par sted cing rigs kyi bu de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la den de dag gi sbyin pa yang gnan mo sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan mi sum du ma sems shig
138a8(yum): sbyin pa dag kyang gzhan la/ len pa yang gzhan no snyam du ma sems shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod nam sbyin po yang gnan pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan na snyam du ma sems
138b1(yum): shig/ sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la len pa yang gan na snyam du mi sems pa de'i che/ khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di 'dud spyi'i 'bras drang mthar 'dud drir 'gyur te/ sbyin
138b2(yum): pa 'dris gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin cig/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 'dzin cing / de ci'i phyir zhe na/
138b3(yum): ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pas stong ngo // de'i 'bras bu yang 'bras bu stong ngo // sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gi stong ngo // len pa yang lon pas spyong
138b4(yum): stong pa nyid lo ni sbyin pa mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / sbyin bdag dang len pa mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis
138b5(yum): shin tu stong ngo zhes brjod do// gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
138b6(yum): mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul khrims la 'god de/ tshurI rigs kyi bu srog gcod pa spongs la/ srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig ma
138b7(yum): byin par len pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba la 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig
138b8(yum): rdu du smra ba spongs la rdzun du sba ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ phra ma smra ba spong ba la phram snang ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig so
138b9(yum): ra pa lar
139a1(yum): la ne bcod pa'i tshig las byar ldog par byas na/ khrul pa snangs pa rgyag rgyu bum nur rdzun par byas cig/ chags /
139a2(yum): spongs la chags sems pas phyir ldog par gyis TIg/ gnod sems blangs la gnod sa las phyer ldog par gyis zhes/ mig par rdza bzengs la lag ba
139a3(yum): las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag lhur yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang med kyis rigs kyi bu sems dang / gang gi sreg pa
139a4(yum): bar bya ba'i srog chags dang / gang gis srog bcad par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yan/ gang ma byin par blang ba dang / ma byin par len par dgas pa dang / ga
139a5(yum): gis ma byin pa byin par blangs pa de lta bu'i chos kyang ga nig yin/ gang 'dor pa log par g.yem pa dang / 'dod pas log gra yem par btags pa dang /
139a6(yum): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang brdzun du sba ba dang / brdzun tu smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis brdzun smra bar bya/
139a7(yum): bain+d+ha d+hA chos kyang ga mig yin/ gang pram smra bar dang / rnam smra byar drang bus 'dod / gdag kyi ma bde ma bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ ga mam
139a8(yum): pa'i tshig smra ba dang / ni gtsang bar 'dags parjing / gang gis ni btsod pa'i tshig tus bdes bu'i chos kyi gang nig yin/ gang cig rgyal bsnga ba dang /
139b1(yum): bdags pa dang / gang gis tshig khyal bar smra bde lta duni chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang chags sems bskyed pa dang / chags sems su bdags pa dang /
139b2(yum): gang gis chags sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang nig yin/ gang gnod sems skyed pa dang / gnod sems su btags pa dang / gang gis gnod
139b3(yum): sems su bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang log par lta ba dang / log par lta bar btags pa dang / gang gis log par lta ba mthong ba de lta bu'i
139b4(yum): chos kyang gang ni g.yin zhes ston cing tshul khrims la 'god de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas
139b5(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// des de la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu bstan te
139b6(yum): sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan pas rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid
139b7(yum): kyis stong par rig nas/ de la mngon par zhes par mi byed do// mngon par zhen pa med pas 'khrug par mi 'gyur ning shes rab skyed do// shes rab des kyang
139b8(yum): bganyal ba dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad bcad nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de yang 'jig
140a1(yum): rten gyi tha skad kyi ma yin gyi don dam par ma yin no// de ci phyir zhe na/ spo pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bdam/
140a2(yum): su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ de'i du las 'das pa nas byang ni 'di la ste/ mnga' las 'das pa sod pacing
140a3(yum): do/ rab 'byor gan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la saspyod pa'i tshe/ sems can phan tshun gnod par sems
140a4(yum): shing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang ldan pa dag mthong na 'di skad du 'dems shing ston to// rigs kyi bu bzod pa bsgrubs shig/ bzod pa sgoms shig/ des
140a5(yum): pa dang sems ni ba dang / ngeng du sems pa'i ngang tshul can du gyis shig/ gang gnod par byed pa dang / gang gis gnod par bya ba dang / gang la gnod par bya/
140a6(yum): ba'i chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis spong ba yin gyis/ rigs kyi zug nod par byed pa ni su yong / gnod par ni stsol bya/ cis ni gnod par bya/
140a7(yum): dang chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang mi stod par mi 'gyur te/ de ni de bzhin
140a8(yum): gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas so// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas so// nyan dzes rnams
140b1(yum): kyis ma byas so// lha rnams kyis ma byas so// klu rnams kyis ma byas so// gnod sbyin rnams kyis ma byas so// dri za rnams kyis ma byas so// ldan/
140b2(yum): yin rnams kyis ma byas so// nam mkha' lding rnams kyis ma byas so// mi 'am ci rnams kyis ma byas so// lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma byas su
140b3(yum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so// sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dgo' dang / gzhan 'phrul ngo bar byed
140b4(yum): dang / tshangs pa dang / dge rgyas dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i
140b5(yum): skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis byas te/ de ni rtag par yang rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // rang bzhin gyis spong ba
140b6(yum): laM ni su la yang gnod par mi byed do zhes nas/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod tsang //
140b7(yum): sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu la spyod pa te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dgo de cing rim gyis
140b8(yum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag pa ston to// ming dag par skul lo// yang dag par bzed stod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do//
141a1(yum): banog go/ 'dul lo// rabadu 'bong ngo // de ya 'jig rten gying ska pan gyi nu ma pa yi no// de tsi gyur chem/
141a2(yum): bzhin stong pa nyid la gang rjod par byed pa dang / gang gis rjong bar bya dang / gang thong bar byed pa bang yang meng ngo // rab 'byor 'dir yang dag pa'i bathang sdong
141a3(yum): 'a de de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du gar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ de la sems ca
141a4(yum): du dmigs pa med do// sems can du gdags pa dmigs pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni sems can gyis dben pa'o// rab 'byor
141a5(yum): granan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mangs pas sems can le lo can brtson 'grus
141a6(yum): chung ba dang mthong na 'di ltar lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul te/ rigs kyi bu dag rang bzhin stong panyid la ni chos gang yang num ni la la
141a7(yum): 'gyur ba'am gang lal rdum ning le lo 'gyur pa'am/ ga gis dum ning le lor 'gyur ba'am/ gang zhum ming le lo 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mer po chos nge sa
141a8(yum): thams cad kyang rang bzhin sring pa tshang las mi 'ang ba yin gyis lus rang sems kyi brtsod 'grus bskyed le lar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'am/ tshul thams sa
141b1(yum): bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid spong
141b2(yum): nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas spong ba nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
141b3(yum): dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid /
141b4(yum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams sam
141b5(yum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'bral gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'bags pa'i lam
141b6(yum): yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i sdoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/
141b7(yum): par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang smon pa med pa'am mngon
141b8(yum): par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so
142a1(yum): yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen pongam/ snying rjechen po 'gu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brjod par byas /
142a2(yum): rigs kyi bu dag stod pa nyid kyis chos de dag thams cad sgrib pa med par rdzogs shig/ sgrib pa med pa'i chos la rnam par 'gyur ba gang yang med do// zhes rab 'byo
142a3(yum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she ser rabakyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can la rang bzhin spong ba nyid yang /
142a4(yum): par ston to// yang dag par bsal lo// yang dag par bzeng sdod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// gnog go// 'dul lo// rab du 'grod do// ci nas kyang gnyis/
142a5(yum): la gnas pa de ltar rab tu 'ger ngo ro// de ci'i phyir ne na/ rang bzhin sdong pa'i ni gnyis su med de granyis su byar ded do// gnyis su med pa'i chos ni gang la yang gnas
142a6(yum): bamed do/ rab 'byor bzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyod ba'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang
142a7(yum): 'dzin song ba'i kyis brtson 'grus 'jibs shing rjes su stor te/ chur rigs kyi du sbyin bra bo/ rdub khrims sam/ brjod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ sa
142a8(yum): gang na ngam/ shes rab 'am/ darje spong ba'i dang ma/ bye spong pa zhi dang ga/ phyi nang stong pa'i dam/ song bzhing song bzhid dab/ chen po sring po'irang dang /
142b1(yum): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngor ba/
142b2(yum): med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin spyod pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/
142b3(yum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag
142b4(yum): par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags

142b6(yum): par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa'i
142b7(yum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang sngon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sram/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs
142b8(yum): sa stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag pa rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas
143a1(yum): chos ma 'dres bdagal brtson 'grus bcob pa/ rgyas rkye gaganas pa pa yang me ma byung cig/ m-i gas pa yang med pam bya
143a2(yum): de ci'i phyir zhen/ chos de dag ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa sa/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyis par nga sa rgyab ma tshan/ maM gnas par yang yidas bye ma
143a3(yum): no// rab byor lar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen no zhes rab kyi ba rim du ldan dul skyong ba'i tshe/ thabs ma khas pas sems ca rnams dang na
143a4(yum): panyid la yongs su smon par byed do// yongs su smin par byas nas rim gyis rgyun du na gos pa'i 'dzas rdul 'dong ngo // man cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras dul 'phong

143a6(yum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'gong ngo do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa tshe/ thabs pa khas pa/
