446a7(yum): de bzhin nyid dang / banar ma par bde bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang chos skyer med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de ra
446a8(yum): ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / mnar ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos snya
446b1(yum): med pa nyid dang / 5\u0f7fyang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
446b2(yum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de las rnam par mi 'da'o//
446b3(yum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin du nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gnan ma yin pa
446b4(yum): bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te/ de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal
446b5(yum): te de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa nyid ni dad pa'i rjes su 'thang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos
446b6(yum): mnyam pa nyid de nyid ni brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/
446b7(yum): de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sem
446b8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos nyam pa nyid/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lagasan/
447a1(yum): bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba das
447a2(yum): sA dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / swA dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig sa
447a3(yum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i rnam par
447a4(yum): pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
447a5(yum): tshor ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid
447a6(yum): 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams
447a7(yum): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang / gti mug
447a8(yum): dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrim
447b1(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyiran pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
447b2(yum): dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sem
447b3(yum): dpa'i sa bcu dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spang ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang
447b4(yum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
447b5(yum): med pa dang spor pa med dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen ba stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
447b6(yum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa snang
447b7(yum): pa dang / rang sa bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/
447b8(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par mthar pa brgyad pa dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par
448a1(yum): par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs gi sa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
448a2(yum): sa sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen ba dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / michen pa'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gas
448a3(yum): dang dpe'i byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du shes
448a4(yum): kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos kyang bzhin/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang bzhin/ mig gi chos nyid kyang bzhin/ rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan
448a5(yum): sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ khwa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhar/ yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhar/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang banam/ sna'i chos
448a6(yum): nyid kyang gzham/ dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ de'i chos nyid kyang gnas/ reg gi chos nyid kyang gan/ chos kyi chas nyid kyang gzham mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chas
448a7(yum): kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi na
448a8(yum): par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhar/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gnan/ rna ba'i 'dus te rag pa'i chos /
448b1(yum): kyang gnan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lnga'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus
448b2(yum): te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg
448b3(yum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid rkang
448b4(yum): gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ me'i khams
448b5(yum): kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ namakha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhar/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
448b6(yum): ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched
448b7(yum): drug gi chos nyid kyang gnan/ reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhar tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ len pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan//
448b8(yum): srid pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rga shi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan
449a1(yum): gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lta ba'i rnam pa chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzham/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
449a2(yum): pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyid pa'i
449a3(yum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi nang stong pa
449a4(yum): nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stong pa nyid snang pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang bzhin/ den dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos kyang gzhan
449a5(yum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ thog ma dang
449a6(yum): za ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos kyang gzhar/ der ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos thams cad srung banyid
449a7(yum): kye chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mi dmigs pa spang panyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngas pa med pa snang pa nyid kyi chos
449a8(yum): kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan
449b1(yum): yang dag par spang ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gnan/ stobs rnams
449b2(yum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i bden
449b3(yum): rnams kyis chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
449b4(yum): pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
449b5(yum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang min pa med pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos
449b6(yum): nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi so rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid
449b7(yum): kyang gzhan/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sangs rgyas
449b8(yum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mi che ba'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dpe byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang bzhin/
450a1(yum): / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos
450a2(yum): rnams kyi tshon cing / gcig par 'gyur ba lags/ chos rnams rnam par dgod par ni ci ltar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab
450a3(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyad pa'i tshe/ gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyi ba lags/ chos rnams tha dad dum yi bgyis par mi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
450a4(yum): chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi/ sa na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sa nas
450a5(yum): sar 'bar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar na spyor med par mazhugs nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te mngon par zhes pa yongs su rdzag
450a6(yum): par 'gyeng ba lags/ ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyir yongs su rdzogs par gyi ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzos
450a7(yum): bar bgyi ba dang / bzong pa'i pha rol tu phyir pa yangs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bsams
450a8(yum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba / de dag la rnam par rtse ba'i sangs rgyas
450b1(yum): ning nas sangs rgyas kyi bzhing du mchi ba lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstar bkur bgyid ba lags/ de dag du yang dge ba'i rtsa ba babyung ba lags/
450b2(yum): dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams dayongs su srir bar bgyid pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
450b3(yum): rab 'byor gang 'di skad du de ste chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dang pa 'ab rjes su 'brang ba rnams
450b4(yum): kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba
450b5(yum): rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos
450b6(yum): mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
450b7(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/ mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ci ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de ci snyam
450b8(yum): du sems/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid
451a1(yum): gang yin pa de nyid stong panying ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa po nyid snang panyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos cing gang yin pa
451a2(yum): de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid snang pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong ba ma yin nam/ sna'i chos cing ma
451a3(yum): yin pa de nyi/ nga stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
451a4(yum): yid kyi cho sa nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sgra'i chos nyid gang yin pa de yin nyid stong pa
451a5(yum): nyid ma yin nam/ dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ de'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid steng ba nyid ma yin nam/ reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
451a6(yum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong ba nyid ma yin nam/
451a7(yum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid snang pa nyid ma yir ram/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes
451a8(yum): pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yid pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yir ram/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
451b1(yum): ros nyid gang yir ba de nyid song ba nyid pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid la yir ram/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos cid gang yin
451b2(yum): de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid pa yir ram/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid spang ba
451b3(yum): nyid ma yir ram/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid ma yir nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid song ba nyid ma yir ra /
451b4(yum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid steng pa nyid ma yin ram/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
451b5(yum): pa nyid mar yin ram/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid
451b6(yum): gang yin pa// de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
451b7(yum): pa'i rkyer gyi/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid gang yin pa spang pa nying ma yin nas/
451b8(yum): chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ me'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ rlung gi khams kyi chos
452a1(yum): gang yin pa de nyid snang ba nyid ma yin nam/ dam pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang mir bde nyid spong pa nyid ma yin napa/ rnam pa shem pa' khams
452a2(yum): nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yid
452a3(yum): nam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin rang/ skye mched drug
452a4(yum): gi chos kyi nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong banyid
452a5(yum): ma yin nam/ sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ len pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ srid gi chos nyid gang
452a6(yum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid snang pa nyid ma yin nam/ rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin bkyer snang pa nyid ma yin nam/
452a7(yum): sbyid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/
452a8(yum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pharal 'byor pa'i chos cing bang yin pa de nying sang bcing ma yi ras/
452b1(yum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin rag
452b2(yum): nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos
452b3(yum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yir ba de
452b4(yum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
452b5(yum): ma yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
452b6(yum): nyid ma yin dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
452b7(yum): pa nyid ma yin na pa/ rang gzhin stong nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid spong ba da
452b8(yum): ma yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid su
453a1(yum): pa nyid ma yin ram/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyi
453a2(yum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid glang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi
453a3(yum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nying stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong panyid ma yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang /
453a4(yum): rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stabs rnams kyi chos
453a5(yum): nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub kyi yar lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yir nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yang
453a6(yum): lag brgyang ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ 'phags pa'i bder pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
453a7(yum): bsam gtad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshang meng pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yir rnam/
453a8(yum): gzugs meng po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid song ba nyid ma yid nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa /
453b1(yum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid pa yin ram/ rnam par mthar pa'i sa sa
453b2(yum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
453b3(yum): ba yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam
453b4(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong sapa nyid ma yin nam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
453b5(yum): nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
453b6(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gung yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyur tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong /
453b7(yum): ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid
453b8(yum): kye chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang
454a1(yum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de cid
454a2(yum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid spang pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir mi 'ang ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyir srung ba nyid ma yin nam/
454a3(yum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong bcing ma yin nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyir stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos
454a4(yum): gang yin pa de nyir stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid mi yin nam/ gsal ba bcom ldan 'das de'i spong ba nyid // bcom ldan 'das
454a5(yum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'on stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ngam// tshor ba'i mtshad nyid dam/ 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed gyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par
454a6(yum): pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi mtshan nyid ngam/ ra ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i mtshan nyid dam/ khwa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi mtshan nyid ngam/ yid kyi mtshan cid dam/
454a7(yum): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ sgra'i mtshan nyid dam/ dri'i mtshan nyid dam/ ro'i mtshan nyid ngam/ reg gi mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi rnam par shes
454a8(yum): mtshan cing ngam/ rna ba'i rnam zhes pa'i mtshan cid dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sa'i rnam par shes rab mtshan cing dam/ lus kyi rnam brdzags pa'i ma
454b1(yum): nyid dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtsha mad
454b2(yum): dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
454b3(yum): ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen za
454b4(yum): tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sa'i khams kyi mtsham
454b5(yum): ru'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rlung gi khams kyis mtshan nyid dam/ na mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
454b6(yum): mtshan nyid dam/ ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ skye mched drug gi mtsham
454b7(yum): nyid dam/ reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sred pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ len pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang/
454b8(yum): rga shi'i mtshan nyid dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ngam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyir pa'i mtshan nyid dam/
455a1(yum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam
455a2(yum): nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stong pa nyid srung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chen po snang pa
455a3(yum): kyi mtshan cid ngam/ ngan ngam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtsham nying dam/ 'dus ma byas song pa nyid kyi mtshan cid ngam/ mtha' las
455a4(yum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dor ba med bsong panyid kyi mtshan nyid ngam/ rang bzhin spang pa nyid kyi mtshan
455a5(yum): nyid ngam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mi dgas pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos pa med pa
455a6(yum): stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid spang ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtsham nyid ngam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
455a7(yum): mtshan nyid dam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mamatshan nyid dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ngam/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stabs
455a8(yum): rnams kyi mtshar cing ngam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid ngam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i bden param
455b1(yum): kyi mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid da
455b2(yum): rnam par thar pa ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan mang med
455b3(yum): ba dang sman pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzungs kyi sgra rnams kyi mtshan
455b4(yum): nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid ngam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan
455b5(yum): nyid dam/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig
455b6(yum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dam/
455b7(yum): lam gyi rnams par shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyan du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid ngam/ lan cig phyir 'ong
455b8(yum): ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan cing ngam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub sems da
456a1(yum): mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta ba'i chos gang yang dmigs sam/
456a2(yum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na rnam bgrangs nges 'di ltar rig par byas/
456a3(yum): chos thams cad gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de la yangs sa'i skye bo med/ sa sa'i skye baM las gung ra yang de med/ del yang dang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba med/ dang
456a4(yum): rjes su 'azang ba las gud na yang de med/ de la yang chos rjes su 'brang ba med/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gung na yang de med/ de las lang brkyang ba med/
456a5(yum): brgyad pa las gung yang de med/ de la rgyun tu zhugs pa med/ rgyar tu zhugs pa las gung na yang de med/ de la lar gcig phyir 'ong ba med/ lar cig phyir 'ang
456a6(yum): las gung du yang de med/ de la yang phyir ma 'ong ba red/ byir mo'ang ba las gung na yang de bed/ de lang gra bcom pa nyid med/ dgra bcom pa las grang na yang
456a7(yum): de med/ de la yang rang sangs rgyas med/ rang sangs rgyas las gung ra yang re med/ de la byang chub sems dpa' bed/ byang chub sems dpa' ba las gung nag
456a8(yum): de med/ de la yang de bzhir gshegs pa zang / de bzhin gshegs pa las grang na yang dmed par rig par bya'o// gsol ba chos nyi nga 'dus byas pa lags sam/
456b1(yum): 'dus ma 'gyes pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ deri 'dus byas kyang ma yin/ 'dus pa byas kyang ma yin te/ 'dus byas las gung na yang
456b2(yum): 'dus ma byas dmigs su med 'dus ma byas las gud na yang 'dus byas dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang / rab 'byor 'dus byas
456b3(yum): kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang mi yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstar tu med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig
456b4(yum): pa ste/ de ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o// de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjed kyi/ don dam par ri ma yin te/ dor dam pa la lus kyi 'du byed dam/
456b5(yum): ngag gi 'du byed dam/ yid kyi 'du byed med de/ lus kyi 'dus byed dam/ ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'dus byed las gud na yang dor dam pa dmigs su med 'on 'dus
456b6(yum): byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
456b7(yum): spyod pa'i sa tshe/ dor dam pa las kyang mig yol byang chub sems dpa'i spyang ba yang byed do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//
456b8(yum): le'u bdun bcu gnyis so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal no/ bco ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mas
457a1(yum): pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyi stong pa ste/ de'i srang du chos gang la yang gang yang chos ci yang bgying pa ma mchis sar/ de ltar chos thams cad ci yang
457a2(yum): bgyed pa ma mchis shing ci yang ma lags pa la ci lar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa la spong ba'i tshe/ der dam pa las bri
457a3(yum): la/ skyer ba dang tshig sar pa dang / kha don bgyid pa dang / ngor mthur bas kyang sems can thams cad kyi der bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
457a4(yum): rab 'byor de de bzhin/ de de bzhin te/ ci skang du sbas pa bzhin te/ spong ba nyid gang yin pa de gang la yang byed pa med/ tsa yang mi byed pa yang med de/ gal te sems
457a5(yum): can 'di dag bdag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni de ltar stong pa nyid las mi g.yo la/ sems cad rnams kyang bdag gis 'du shes dang 'bral bar byed cing bdag gis
457a6(yum): 'das shes dang bral ras stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grol ba dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang 'bral bar byed bcang sems kyi 'du shes dang bral nas/ snang ba/
457a7(yum): nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel pa dang / srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing srog gi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel bdang / 'gro ba'i
457a8(yum): 'du shes bral bar byed cing 'gro ba'i 'du shes rang bral ras stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / gas pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed ci gas pa'i 'du shes ra
457b1(yum): phral nas stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skyes bu'i 'ju shes dang bral bar byed cing skyes bu'i 'du shes dang bral ras stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa da
457b2(yum): gang zag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing gang zag gi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed
457b3(yum): shed can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing shed bdag gi 'du shes dang phral ba nas su
457b4(yum): pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing byed pa po'i 'du shes dang phral ras stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /
457b5(yum): tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing
457b6(yum): shes pa po'i 'du shes dang bral ras stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral nas
457b7(yum): stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'grel pa
457b8(yum): dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phrad stong pa nyid kyi 'khor las 'grel pa dang / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing 'du
458a1(yum): kyi 'jugs dang bral nas snang pacid kyi las 'grel ba dang / 'du byed ba 'tshan sa thas pa byung bang 'a byung ba 'jun pa dang thal ba rnam pa
458a2(yum): kyis 'khar ba las 'brel ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed bci ma par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas spang ba nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel pa dang /
458a3(yum): mig gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing mig gi 'du shes dang bral nas song pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rna ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing rna ba'i 'du shes dang
458a4(yum): tshul nas song pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'phu shes dang bral bar byed cing sna'i 'ju shes dang bral nas stong ba nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba dang /
458a5(yum): lce'i 'dzugs dang thal bar byed cing lnga'i 'du shes dang bral bangs sang pa cad kyis 'khor ba las 'jal ba dang / lus kyis 'du shes dang bral bar byang cing lus kyi'ang
458a6(yum): shes dang pral nas sa panyid kyis 'bar ba las 'phrul ba dang / yang kyi 'dugs dang thal bar byed bang yid kyi 'jugs dang bral nas sang pa'i kyis 'bar bams
458a7(yum): ba dang / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khar ba las 'grel pa dang / sgra'i 'dra shes dang bral bar byed
458a8(yum): cing sna'i 'dra shes dang bral nas spang pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba nang / dri'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing rje'i 'du shes dang bral nas spong ba nyid kyis 'khar ba
458b1(yum): 'brel ba dang / ro'i 'du shes dang bral ra bar byed cing re'i 'du shes dang bral nas snang ba nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba dang / reg gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed
458b2(yum): gi 'du shes dang bral nas spang pa nyid kyis 'khar ba las 'grel ba dang / chos kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing chos kyi 'dra gas dang bral nas spang pa nyid kyis 'khor ba
458b3(yum): 'grel pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /
458b4(yum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing rna ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid dkyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang
458b5(yum): bral bar byed cing sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing lde'i
458b6(yum): rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral na bar byed cing lus kyi rnam par shes
458b7(yum): pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas song pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'dra shes dang bral bar byed cing yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang
458b8(yum): phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas song pa nyid kyis
459a1(yum): 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing rna ba'i 'dus pa rig pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas spang ba'ang kyis la
459a2(yum): bra las 'brel ba dang / sna'i 'dus pa rig pa'i 'jushes dang bral bar byed cing sna'i 'dus te rag pa'i 'ju shes dang bral bangs rung pa cing sa la 'a ba las 'jal ba
459a3(yum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byang cing lde'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'ja
459a4(yum): shes dang bral bar byed cing lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'dre shes dang thal nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'phel ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral
459a5(yum): par byed cing yid kyi 'dus ng+ge'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar bya
459a6(yum): cing mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'dzugs dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'phel ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba'i 'du shes dang /
459a7(yum): thal bar byed cing rna ba'i 'dus te dag pa'i rkyeran gyis tshang ba'i 'du shes nga thal ras spang banyid kyis 'khar ba las 'brel ba nga/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyam kyim char
459a8(yum): 'dzubs dang bral bar byed cing sna'i 'dus pa sa pa'i 'dzugs dpal ras spang bcir kyis 'khar ba las 'brel ba dang / 'i 'du'i rig pa'i rkyen gyim tshar ba'i 'dungs/
459b1(yum): dang bral bar byed cing lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral nas song pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
459b2(yum): 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
459b3(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sa'i khams
459b4(yum): kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing sa'i khams kyi 'dus shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing
459b5(yum): chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / me'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing me'i khams kyis 'du shes dang bral
459b6(yum): nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral ba nas stong pa nyid kyis
459b7(yum): 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang //
459b8(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / ma rig pa'i lam
460a1(yum): kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang thal nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba nga/ 'dra bred kyi 'jugs dang bral bar bya
460a2(yum): cing 'du byed kyi 'jugs dang bral nas snang pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis 'jugs dang bral bar byung byar rnam pamabs
460a3(yum): gi 'drags dang bral nas gang pa nyid kyis 'khar ba las 'phel ba dang / ming dang gzugs kyi 'dru bas nga bral bar byeng cing ming dang gzugs kyi 'jugs dang bral nas mang

460b1(yum): bral nas song pa nyid kyis 'khar ba las 'brel ba dang / rga shi'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing na sha'i 'dus zhes nga thal nas cang panyid kyis 'khar ba las 'phem
460b2(yum): 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral ba nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / 'dus ma byas kyi
460b3(yum): dbyings stong pa nyid yin yid 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su dgod pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthur mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ci'i stong pa lag
460b4(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas thams cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de la gang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de lta bu'i
460b5(yum): dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// sprul pa de la gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis te/
460b6(yum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos te gnyis ka ldan pa ma lags/ mi ldan pa ma lags te/ de gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid kyis stong na/ ci'i srang
460b7(yum): du 'di ni stong pa nyid do/ 'di ni sprul pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcas pa mdzad/ de ci'i srang du zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ste stong pa nyid dang / sprul pa gnyis ka yang stong pa
460b8(yum): la dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes sam/ 'du byang ngam/ rnam par shes
461a1(yum): pa gang yan sprul pa ma yin pangs bu yang sa/ gang skul ni spang pa'ang / gsal ba/ bsam ldan 'das nal 'jim tan pa chas sprul pa la
461a2(yum): kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di la ste/ rngang banye bar gnag pa bzhi pa dang / yang dag par rung ba bani dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang ba ldang

461b1(yum): la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sprul par/ la la ra de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o// lal ni nyon mongs pas sprul par/ la la ni las kyi sprul pa'o// rab 'byor nam

461b3(yum): bu'am/ phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad

461b8(yum): de lta bu med do zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang sprul par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su 'ang
462a1(yum): rab 'byar de de bzhiran/ de de bzhin te/ rab 'byung chos thams cad ni sring pa nyid pa/ dag ma thos kyis kyang ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma byas/
462a2(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kyang ma byas/ de bzhiran gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas te/ ngo bo nyid kyis sang sa
462a3(yum): nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyid/
462a4(yum): la gdams shing rjes su sang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byeng ci sngar dngos po yang bar 'gyur la/ byis ngas pa med par 'gyur ba yang dan
462a5(yum): ngas pa yang ba yang med pa nges pa meng yang med/ nga ba'id kyang zang / gzhan gyis rjes pa yang mengan de la gang yang yongs su shes par bya'ong ba nyid zang pa'i byas bya ba la ya
462a6(yum): par 'gyur resar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sang phrag brgya ba las chos nyid mi 'gyur bar bsad pa'i le'u sa bdun bcu gsum pa'o/ shes rab kyi par
462a7(yum): byed bgang thas barbab las/ dubarbab cagaHsa pa/ ma gnas cug dgupa// nganas byang chub sa sa pa mangs pa' chen pa byams pas tsha
462a8(yum): dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces sbas so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang pa dang ldan pas yi de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar blta bar bya/ de skad ces sbas pa dang /
462b1(yum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces sbas sa/ byams pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang pa dang ldan pas ci
462b2(yum): cung zang kyang mi mthong ba dang / byang zad yang nye bar ma 'dzin pa dang / zang zad kyang sgra btags bzeng ba dang / rung ba kyang ma na pa sla ba med pa de gang nga band gshegs par
462b3(yum): bar bya'o// da ba'i phyir nam/ byams pa stong pacid bzong ba ni/ de bani gshegs pa'i mthong ba'o// mtshan ma med pa mthong ba ri de bzhin gshegs pa mdzang la

462b6(yum): mgog pa mngon gsum du mthong ba ri de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// khams gsum gyi ngo bo nyid shes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// khams gsum las nges par

463a1(yum): par/ sa pa yang ba ma mang pa bad gagags pa mang bar ma pa sa sa gan

463a4(yum): pa ri bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/ ma mnyam pa med pa'i dbyings mthang ba rang banan gshegs pa zung bal/ mchog dang mchag ma yin pa spang ba dang mang pa ma

465b1(yum): bdag gi zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / mam mkha'i khams dang /
465b2(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gi zhes sbyang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa ma yin no// gal te bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// zhes spyod ma shes
465b3(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa ma yin no/ de bzhin tu gal te bdag ni tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
465b4(yum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o// zhes spyong ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gang shes rab kyi
465b5(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba ma yin ro/ byams pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma dad pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar
465b6(yum): 'dodzin/ chos gnyis pa mang pa nyidang nga / mtshan pa med pa la kun tu bster par byar/ datso'i phyir zhe na/ byams bsong panyid kyang banyid gang yin par na rgyas kyi dbyings can
465b7(yum): banyid pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyang btid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bo nyid / byams bgang la mtshar ma mang brdan chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyi byi
465b8(yum): gang yin par ni de bzhir gshegs pa'o// byams pa de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'di bster par bya ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
466a1(yum): ni rnam par rtogs pa thams cad rab tu spong ba la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po byams pas yang tshe dang ldan pa

466a3(yum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa las 'byed po/ byams pas smras pa/ badzud pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang las b+hA / shar dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ byams
466a4(yum): pa rnams par rtog pa rnams ri mig ge rnam par shes pa las 'byung ngo // byams pas smras pa/ bcur pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa gang las byung /
466a5(yum): byams bamig gi rnam par shes pa gzugs las 'byung / byams pas smras pa/ bcung ba shar pa'i'i bu gzugs gang las byung / byabs pa gzugs na ya
466a6(yum): dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtag par las byung / de ci'i phyir ner/ byams pa gzugs na dad dam pa dang po nyid kyis snang bame/ gang na dpapa mang par 'gyur ba
466a7(yum): de ni 'jun pa/ sru ba'i chos cad byis pas ma'i skye ba rnabs dring bar byeng ba yinan/ dal sa sa'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldang ba rnams kyi gzugs 'dugs dang ces
466a8(yum): sba bar 'gyur ro/ ngas sar gzugs su mdza par btags nas/ gzugs la rten 'amig gi dam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la
466b1(yum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rkyer tu 'gyur te/ nga ni yang dag pa ma yin pas nye bar 'gag par 'gyur ba yin na/ de la byis pas pa'i rdzu za thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams yang
466b2(yum): rnam par shes pas 'di ltar gzung ba nyid dang / gzugs nyid dang / kha dog nyid dang / rgyas pa nyid dug nye bar rtog par byed do// de de ltar rnam par rtog pas rgyar mi rung bar 'khor
466b3(yum): ba na 'khor ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du ma shes pa'i phyir dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i kur 'byung ba yang dag par
466b4(yum): mi shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mkhas pa rnams ni gzugs gang dang gang mthong ba de nyid thams cad stong pa nyid du yang dag par mthong ba dang /
466b5(yum): gsog nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // byams pa de yang dper ra spyan ma mkhar gyi skyes bu mkhas pa 'am/
466b6(yum): rgya ma mkhar gyi slob ma mkhas pas sgyu ma'i las kyis glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams pa bzhi po nye bar
466b7(yum): bstan par gyur la/ de la skyes bu mkhas pa la la zhig gis bltas pa dang / nges par dmigs par dang / tshul bzhir du yid la byed pas nye bar brtag par 'gyur cis
466b8(yum): des de mthong ba dang / nges par mi dmigs pa dang / tshul bzhin nye bar dmigs par steng pa nyid yin par ston par byed cing / gsog nyid du son pa dang / gsob seng du
467a1(yum): sor ba dang / snying po med pa nyid du ston par byed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu mar byas pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byabs bde bzhid du byung
467a2(yum): chub sems dpa' la gzugs gang dang gang nye bar snang bar 'gyur ba de dang de thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong ngo // gsog nyid du bathong ngo // gsopa nyid du mthong ngo // seng po med
467a3(yum): pa nyid du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de ri yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ byams pa 'di lta ste dper na 'ja' mtshor rab/ dri za'i grong khyer blta na sdug par
467a4(yum): bar 'phags par snang bar gyur pa dgu la skye bu la la zhig gis mthong ba dang / nye bar dmigs pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas nye bar brtags par gyur la des de mthong
467a5(yum): ba dang / nges par dmigs pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas nye bar brtag par 'gyur pa nas/ stong pa nyid du gyur par byed pa dang / gsagatid du skyerd par byed pa dang /
467a6(yum): gsob nyid du ston par byed pa dang / snying po med pa'i du ston par byed do/ byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa dang 'dres par 'gyur ba'i rnam
467a7(yum): par shes pa gang dang gang dag yin pa de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i sang pa nyid du mthong ba dang / gsog nyid du mthong ba dang / gsob cing du mthong ba dang / snying pa med
467a8(yum): btid du mthong ba dang / de ci'i byang zhem/ de sar na yang gzugs de yangs su ma shes pa'i phyir / rnam par rdzogs pa kur 'byung ba'i 'jugs yangs su pashes pa
467b1(yum): phyir ro// de de ltar gzugs la mkhas pa dang / 'du shes la mkhas pa yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur zhing skyon med pa dang
467b2(yum): ma 'dres pa dang / na rlog med pa dang / nges par 'byung ba can dang / byis pa rnams kyi sdom pa las yang dag par 'das pa dang / 'phags pa'i sdom pa rnams kyis rjes su yang dag
467b3(yum): par 'jug pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / dri ma thams cad bral ba dang / gnas med par 'gyur ba yin no// de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa de'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
467b4(yum): sems dang lhan cig gnas pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad nas thams cad du 'byang bar mi 'gyur zhing nub pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / yongs su gtugs pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /
467b5(yum): de'i sems rang nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur gyi/ sems kyi dbang du mi 'gyur ro/ de ltar sems la dbang thob pa de'i sems gang dang gang skye bar 'gyur ba de dang de thams cad byang chub
467b6(yum): la gzhol ba dang / byang chub la 'bab pa dang / byang chub la bab par gyur pa dang / mchog dang / khyad par 'phags pa dang / rgya che ba dang / 'od gsal ba dang / nyan thos dang
467b7(yum): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / ma 'dres pa dang / rgyur gcig tu 'jug pa dang / yid la byed pa gzhan med par de'i sems de 'bang ba meng bar dar gyi la bya ba thams
467b8(yum): mkhyen pa nyi ngal mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na skye ba'i dus la bab par 'gyur cing nges de dang nye bar gnas par gyur par 'bang ba med par mngal
468a1(yum): gaskor nye bar phyogs par gyur pa dang / mngal gyi skanas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de ci'i phyir zhen/ se nas kyang chos nyid de las sor dmigs pa nyid nabyung
468a2(yum): chub sems dpa'i sems 'bad pa med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro/ byams pa 'di lta steng dab ra skyes bra la la 'chi ba'i dus la bab par 'gyur cing
468a3(yum): dus de dang nye bar gnas pa'i gyur pa na 'bang pa med pa nyid kyis srog gi dbang po 'gag pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing 'gag pa'i rgyu dang rjes su mthun pa dang / 'gag pa'i rgyun la bzhol ba
468a4(yum): dang / 'gag pa'i rgyar la bab par 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems 'bang ba med par don gyi bya ba thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
468a5(yum): mngor par 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las can rnams ni 'bang pa med par lha'i 'jig rten tu skye bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du
468a6(yum): byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems 'bang ba med par pon gyi bya ba thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen par nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro/ da ltar sams myed kyang mjam
468a7(yum): shes par skye ba'am/ 'gag pa de la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyim che na/ cims kyang rigs rab kyi sabs dang / shes rab kyi ldang bar gyis byung / sems cad yangs
468a8(yum): sa min par byung ba'adi ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi skams ya ma/ gang sems cad yang sa par ming migs la 'khar ba'isas pas kyang rgas par mi 'gyur ba 'dzi byed cha
468b1(yum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par yin no// gzhar yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi khyad par ri kun tu skyed pas gnyis mthong ba ni byang chub
468b2(yum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// kun tu spyad pa gnyis mthong bas ma gos pa ni shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nyan thos kyis nges pa las 'das pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
468b3(yum): shes rab kyi stobs so/ de la dere ba med pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// phyi dang nang gi gdag nyid can gyis dngos po yongs su spong b.ri shes rab kyi
468b4(yum): stobs so// rnam par srid par ba la re ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs
468b5(yum): de dang tha mi dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// khro ba med pa nyid ni byang chub sems dba'i shes rab kyi stobs so// byams pa'i stobs kyi rjes su
468b6(yum): 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// brtson 'grus 'bar ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// yid yongs su skye ba med pa nyid ri byang
468b7(yum): chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de la mngon par
468b8(yum): par zhen pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// shes rab bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems cad dang sreg nye bar
469a1(yum): mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// zhi ba la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi bas so/ sems can ltos pa meng
469a2(yum): ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// de bzhir gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku yongs su ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs sa// chos kyi sku la
469a3(yum): dag par stor pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa nyid du yang dag par stor pa de byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so//
469a4(yum): sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa nyid du sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi mthu sna tshogs pa nyid du spor pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shA
469a5(yum): rab kyi stobs so/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu gcig pa nyid du stong parani byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kur ras ca sangs pa cang dang /
469a6(yum): kur ras nyer mongs pa med par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kur nas nyir mongs pa med par stor pa ri byang chub sem
469a7(yum): dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa ri byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing snga tshogs su stong pa nyid ni
469a8(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyang bar ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i spang ba rgya chen pa yang dag par len pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi gams so// mam
469b1(yum): snang pa yang dag par stor pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// rtag tu nges par 'byung ba la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so//
469b2(yum): srid pa tha ma pa nyid nges par 'byung ba la gnas pa ri byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dbang phyug che ba'i lha'i 'jig rten tu skyes shing gnas te mngon par byang chub
469b3(yum): ba la sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar yang dag par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro//
469b4(yum): bdud kyi las yongs su shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stabs so// bdung thams cad tshar gcad ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro//
469b5(yum): rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo legs par skor ba nyid ri byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su skor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad
469b6(yum): par ro// mya ngan las 'das pa'i yang dag pa nyid ci lta ba bzhin du shes pa ni shabyang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par ston pa nyid
469b7(yum): na byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos la sa sa rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stabs so// de rnams yang dag par ston pa nyid
469b8(yum): ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// zhi ba'i tshul mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mi zad pa'i tshul yang dag par stor
470a1(yum): / pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad parar/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos mngan gsum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi skangs
470a2(yum): lam de rab tu shes rab byed par byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// tshul gcig mngor sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs sa//
470a3(yum): sna tshogs pa'i tshul stor pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nyon mongs pa nye bar mi dmigs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so//
470a4(yum): nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po rab tu shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don dam pa mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so//
470a5(yum): tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs pa gsal bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas tshul gcig tu yang dag par ston pa ni byang chub
470a6(yum): sems dpa' shes rab kyi skabs sa/ mtshan nyid sna tshogs nyid du stor pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro/ byams pa cher po la 'jug pa ni byang chub
470a7(yum): sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can rnams las phan par 'dong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi khyad par ro// snying rje chen po la gnas par
470a8(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyis pas so// sems can rnams la phan par 'dod par byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dga' ba cher po ni byang chub
470b1(yum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// rtag tu zhi brnam par 'phel ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// btang snyoms chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stabs
470b2(yum): so// sems can gyi bya ba rnams la skyo ba med pa ni byang chub sems rapa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i tshul la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
470b3(yum): rab kyi stobs so// bdul bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mngor bar 'dus byas
470b4(yum): pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mos pa sna tshogs pa'i gdul bya rnams 'dul byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro//
470b5(yum): yi ge bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su ston pa de byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba sna tshogs pa sted par byed pa ni byang chub
470b6(yum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sna dbyangs sna tshogs su mngon par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sgra skad sna tshogs la mngon par
470b7(yum): mos pa'i gdul bya rnams gdul bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// spobs pa sna tshogs pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so//
470b8(yum): phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dus sum smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// don yong par
471a1(yum): chos ston par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi 'a khyad par ro// yang dag par sla ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so//
471a2(yum): yang dag pa ma yin pa de nyid du slu ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// de nas lha'i la la zhig 'khor der 'dus pa de'i nang du 'dus par gyur pa de yang dag pa ma yin
471a3(yum): bar sba ba nyid kyi sngar sla ba nyid la rtog pa 'di lta bur skyes par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims 'chal ba'i yan lag tu gyur pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i
471a4(yum): rgyur gyur pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rkyen tu gyur pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa de nyid btsur pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sem
471a5(yum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi khyad par du btags pa 'di ci zhig yin snyam mo/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus yun ring ma len pa zhig na sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de rnam
471a6(yum): kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyed rnams kyis ci ltar rjes su bsam pa dang / rnam par rtag par byed pa
471a7(yum): bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu'ir kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas kyi chos gang yang dag pa ma yin pa de ni brdzunar pa smra ba'i chas can byis pa sa ma rgyal
471a8(yum): rnams 'dzing par byed pa/ martag pa menyan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pasam de'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin/ zhes bshad de/ yang bya
471b1(yum): chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par gyis sred pa la skyed pa'i sems cad rnams nye bar ston par byed cing sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i chu 'or nub pa/ 'khor ba'i brtson ral
471b2(yum): mngon par dga' ba/ byir ci'i log bzhis phyir ci log tu gyur pa/ bdag tu 'dzin pa dang mngon par ldan pa/ 'jig tshogs su blta ba la rjes su skyed pa/ 'gro ba sna tshogs pa zla tha
471b3(yum): dad par gyur pa/ snyigs ma lngas snyegs par gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dbang du gyur pa/ sems rnam par myos pa/ sems rnams par rtog pa dang ldan
471b4(yum): pa/ sems la bde ba med pa/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ 'dus byas kyi bde ba rnams thos nas dge ba'i chos la mngon par gzhol bar 'gyur ba yin la/ dge ba'i chos la mngon par
471b5(yum): gzhol ba de rnams sdoms pa rnam par dag par 'gyur cig sos kyi ngo bo nyid thob nas de'i 'og tu 'dus byas kyi bde ba las bslang ste/ 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba la 'jog par
471b6(yum): byed do// lha'i bu rgya 'di dang rkyen 'dis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// zhes smras pa yin no/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' bya ba
471b7(yum): pas yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di skad ces sbas so/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi stobs dang /
471b8(yum): shes kyi khyad par la yang khyod kyis spobs bar gyis shig/ de skad ces sbas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
472a1(yum): 'di skad ces smras sa/ byams pa sbyin par byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi skabs sa/ sbying pa'i 'bras bral rab med pa ni byang chub sems
472a2(yum): shes rab kyi khyad par ro/ snyan par sla ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// ngag gi sdom pa sbyid pa dang bcas pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyang
472a3(yum): par/ des spyong pa ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs so// byang chub sems 'dod pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyang b.rar// don mthun pa
472a4(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// rigs mthun pa ni gdul bya mas 'dul ba'i thabs ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byang chub
472a5(yum): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgya mchoms rjo klas par
472a6(yum): 'tshang rgya bar sems pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro/ byams pa de ltar na bslab pa la kun tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pas nyan thos pa
472a7(yum): rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis panor pa de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab nyi dang de bzhin gshegs pa
472a8(yum): mthong bar 'gyur ba yin no/ byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab mchos thams cad yongs su bsdus pa shes pa yin no/ bstan pa 'di bsan pa na lha'i bral
472b1(yum): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur/
472b2(yum): lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems skyes so// lha'i bu dpag tu med pas lha'i me tog man d+har ba dang / man dA ra ba chen pos
472b3(yum): bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtar sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams la gtor/ mngon par gtor bar 'gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
472b4(yum): kyi sku gser gyi kha tog can las na bza' gshus te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la chos kyis dag pa par stsal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
472b5(yum): gtsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung ras/ na bza' de yang dag par mnos te blangs nas spyi bor gzhag ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod
472b6(yum): do/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa'adang / tshangs pa dang / bcas pa dang / dge sbyong da
472b7(yum): bram zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi mdog can las na bza' ba shus te/ chos kyi cho ga dang rjes su bzur bar
472b8(yum): btsal ba ni rnyeng pa lags par rnyed do/ sems can gang gis rnal ma du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur pa de rnams raM las yongs su rdzogs par gyur par yid pa mams pa
473a1(yum): bya'o// yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang nga rgyal nges par bcom par gyur pa dang / theg pa chen po la sangs par zhugs ci
473a2(yum): tshogs yang dag par bsags par 'gyur ba dang / skye ba de dang de yongs su rjes su pa na/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba la legs par bser bkur byed par gyur pa dang
473a3(yum): chos kyi rgyar la nges par 'jug par 'gyur ba yin na/ gang 'dzin par byed pa dang / klog par byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab ru 'dor par byed padang
473a4(yum): lung dor par byed pa dang / ston par byed pa dang / kha tor byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang /
473a5(yum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshar dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang ba dag gis/ bkur bsting byed pa dang / tha mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang
473a6(yum): mchod par byed pa dang / rjed par byed pa dang / gsol bar byed pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i
473a7(yum): ri bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir ner/ shar dwa ti'i bu dkon mchog gsum po mi 'di las 'byung ba yid pa'i phyir ro// shar pa'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rags
473a8(yum): gyi bu ma gang la la shes rab kyi pharal tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'tshang ba dang / theg pa dang / kur chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dzin pang/ 'alung sa
473b1(yum): stod pa dang / kha tor byed pa dang / yi ger bri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / mchod pa rnams pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed pa de ni dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur
473b2(yum): ba/ mi khom pa rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ drang ba mnyam par mi 'gyur te/ gzhan dur
473b3(yum): de 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ de de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i rna bas drung du skye bar 'gyur zhing / dang skyes nas kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha rnams su gyur zhing //
473b4(yum): chos kyi dga' ba la mngon par dga'i/ lus kyi dga' ba la mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// de de ras she 'phos nas mi'i nang du dad pa dang ldan zhing yang dag par rab 'byor pa
473b5(yum): ldan pa'i mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa las chos bston pa thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
473b6(yum): tu nges par 'gyur te/ 'di yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de'i phan yod yin par shes par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu dri ma med par bkod pa zhes bya ba 'khor 'dus pa de
473b7(yum): nyid kyi nang du 'dus par 'gyur ras 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi
473b8(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'dil bkur stir 'gying pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / rje bar bgyid pa dang / gsol bar bgyid pa
475a1(yum): dang / me tog dang / sras dang / mar ma dang / dre ngang/ 'greng ba dang / byug pa dang / byam nga rnas gas pa/ gdugs papa rgyal mtshan dang / #
475a2(yum): kyis mchod par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo de dag ri drug gis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur/ mes pachi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur/ chus mchi ba'i dus bgying
475a3(yum): par mi 'gyur/ mtshor gyis mchi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur/ brjed byed dang/ smang bye dang/ gnor chu'i gad kyis bzungs mchi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyu
475a4(yum): gzhan du ra dbang po bde bar gnas pa dang / tshig 'phrul pa med pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i sems kyis mche ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur/ de che'i dus bgyid pa dang / de bzhin
475a5(yum): gshegs pa byams pa'i sprul pa de'i mdud na zhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lnga'i bu de de bzhin ro// de de bzhin te/ de nas byang chub sems
475a6(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen ba byams pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzi
475a7(yum): bdang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byang ba dang / tshul gzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gnang dag lan+d+ha char yang dag par sad par byed pa de la bdag gis sa bas
475a8(yum): dang mthu dang phred pa bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / yang dag par spang bar bgyi'o// mi ma yin pa rnams kyang de la spang ba byed pa nyid du 'tshal pa bye
475b1(yum): de la mi ma yin pa rnams bsnyer bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / de bdud gyi las yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyang de la bsrung bar byed par 'gyur bar ba
475b2(yum): ba dang / de la gcar bzar gdug pa can rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / de'i 'thabs pa dang g.yul 'gyed pa dang / rtsod par smra ba rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang
475b3(yum): bde bar gnyid log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ba dang / skrag cig jigs pa med pa'i rmi lam mthong ba dang / de'i nyin mo dang / mtshan mo bde bas 'da' bar byed pa dang /
475b4(yum): las kyis bsgribs pa gang dag yod pa de thams cad mthong ba'i chos la yongs su zad par 'gyur ba dang / de la mgo ba'i nang dam/ mig gi nad dam/ rtsi ba logs kyi nang
475b5(yum): ngam/ lto'i nang ngam/ rlung gi nang dam/ khrigs pa'i nang ngam/ pad kan gyi nang dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa'am/
475b6(yum): yul gzhan du gro ba 'am/ mchi ma 'dzag pa'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba thos pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i nyes pa gzhan gang yang rung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi//
475b7(yum): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis chos smra ba gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa dang / yang dag par gzung ba dang //
475b8(yum): grags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa'i chos smra ba de la bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// spyir gnas kyi 'du shes dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang /
476a1(yum): ston pa'i 'du shes dang / nye bar ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// nges chos smra ba de'i yon tan rjes su bsgrag par bya ba dang / bsod pa'i tshig
476a2(yum): bsgrag par bya ba dang / blta bar 'dod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos smra ba ni 'jig rten long ba rnams la mi gaster bar
476a3(yum): byed pa yin no/ chos smra ba mchod pas ni de bzhir gshegs pa mchod pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ byams pa legs so legs su/
476a4(yum): tshig 'di legs par smras so// de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus kyang bshad pa legs so legs so// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
476a5(yum): brgya pa las// / byams pa'i le'u sde 'dun bcu bzhi pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum bu bcu gnyis pa/ bam po gsum brgya pa'o//
476a6(yum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'tshol bar 'dor
476a7(yum): pas/ ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rung ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sna dbyangs mi zad pa
476a8(yum): ldog pa'i drung ma tshangs par sbyang spong pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /
476b1(yum): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu san shes rab kyi pha rol
476b2(yum): tu phyin pa 'di yongs su tshol ba ni ci ltar yongs su btsal bar lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
476b3(yum): stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du sngan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol ba na/ lus ngon du mi gnyer ba dang / srog la ltos pa med
476b4(yum): pa dang / rnyed par dang / bkur sti dag la mi gnas pa de ltar yongs su gtsal to/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'phrog dgon pa zhig du byin pa na
476b5(yum): bar snang las skra 'di lta bu thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song ba shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas kyang lus ngal ba yid la
476b6(yum): byed pa mi skye ba dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / gtung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed ba
476b7(yum): rang / nyin mo lidang la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de ltar mdzashig/ rigs kyi bu nang ngam phyi rol gang la yang sems
476b8(yum): smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yas g.yon du ma lta bar song shig/ lho phyogasu ma yin/ nub phyogs ma dang / byang phyogs su ma yin/ steng du ma yin/ 'og du ma yin/
489a1(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po chos 'phags la bkung su bya ba'i phyir shes shes kyis gzhag go//

490a1(yum): thams mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang

490b2(yum): bgying du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de lam badris so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i

491a2(yum): sachosade bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas bron/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhung snyam mo// de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems

491b2(yum): ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las ma yongs so// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ de dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon// gang du yang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin
491b3(yum): nyid las mag de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ste/ rigs kyi bu mo skye ba la 'ong 'am 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs

491b7(yum): kyi bu 'jog pa 'a'ong ba 'am 'am 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba'i ma 'gro ba med de/
