492a1(yum): a/ nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ni gnyid la
492a2(yum): ni gA'i sa byar med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du grang ba las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di la ste dperan
492a3(yum): masu sos ka'i zla ba tham lanyi mgung gi dus la bab pa'i ma/ sdig tsugayo ba mthong nas der chub tung ngo zhes de dang rgyug ma rigs kyi bu de ris ma
492a4(yum): / gang chung bar byag sa kyi mtsho'am/ la grogs kyu rgya mtsho'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya'ab/ drung phyogs kyi mchos dras pa
492a5(yum): tudus smras paraskyis sbrul chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba la ga la mchis pa/ rigs kyi bunyi mas gdungs shing bris pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'tshal
492a6(yum): thonasarnam mchis pal dzunas bad kyis ngal tshun pa ma sa rnam pa
492a7(yum): rang bams / ba sgra drug su gang pazhi ga shegs pa la gzugasas pa/ na man pa shA pa par da da pa gas pa byod pa
492a8(yum): sa ga da pa la cho pa
492b1(yum): byas dper na mi chu med pa la tur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi bal ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
492b2(yum): ni kyi sa'o/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa 'am bzhud pa med do// rigs
492b3(yum): kyi bu 'ang lci ngan rgyu ma sprul pa glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tsho gas sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do// rig
492b4(yum): kyi bu de bzhin te// sa pa'i sku la yang byon pa 'am bzhud pa med do/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs
492b5(yum): pa ga 'am/ gnyis sam/ gsu pa 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'ag/ sum bcu 'am bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/
492b6(yum): brgyapa ldog pa zhig mthong ba la sa sar pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gsheg
492b7(yum): dag gang nas byo/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhug/ nag su dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam la chos gang yang 'grub pa ma gang // sil
492b8(yum): dri brdzun pa yang dag pa ma lags par/ chos 'phags kyis sngas pa/ deng bzhin / chos thams cad ni ga shegs pas rmi lam la zi'o/ nas gsungam
493a1(yum): rigs kyi thug sa ga 'dun gshegs pas tshas thams pa la
493a2(yum): dang gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la bron pa dang bzhung bar rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'o//
493a3(yum): byon pa dang ru 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba 'gro drug par song ba dang / 'dod pa dang / 'dod par 'gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad ni/
493a4(yum): shes rab kyi / de phyin pa las rgyang ring du 'gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba 'gro sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// yang rigs kyi bug
493a5(yum): ngag chos thams mam lta bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'i zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de dag ni chos thams cad
493a6(yum): gang la yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go/ gang dag chos gang la yang 'ong 'gro ba 'am/ smra ba'am 'gag ma ma nag pa de dag ni
493a7(yum): bzhin gshegs pa chos srid du rab tu shes so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid rab tu shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byod pa dang btung bzlog go// gang dag
493a8(yum): gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/ de ni zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
493b1(yum): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni yul khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di laste/
493b2(yum): dpen rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho phyogs dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og dang /
493b3(yum): phyogs bcu pa pa krung ma 'ongs mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu sems can dag dge ba'i rtsa ba la chen nas brgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che 'byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med par
493b4(yum): 'byung ba ma ko rkyen dang / gzhi la rag las pa yin te chen nas byung ngo / rin po che de dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang dag du yang mi 'pho/
493b5(yum): yod kyi/ yod na rin po che de dag med na rin po che rab tu 'byed de/ rkyen de dag med na rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba yang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
493b6(yum): de bani gshegs pa dag gi sku mngon par grub pa yang gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang du yang ma bzhud de/ sangs rgyas
493b7(yum): na ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa yang ma yin to/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas/ rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa/ sngon gyi 'phrin las rnam par smi
493b8(yum): rgyu las byung ba yin no// de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na sku mngon par 'grub 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par 'grub pa yang mi snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di la
494a1(yum): nga byu // 'byung ba ya / ga naphyu stsal gal n+d+ha

494a5(yum): rnams kyi sgra rjes su grub pa yang rgyal rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ de ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te rgyu gcig gis yin/ rkyen gcig gis/

494a7(yum): te nga rgyu dang rkyenapa med kying gong du yang mi zhung de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa bzhud de lta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang
494a8(yum): kyis bshin du bong du chud par gyis shig/ rigs kyis bu khong gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos khrims cang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa meng par shes pa/
494b1(yum): de dran yang khrod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shes rab kyi pha rol du zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro//
494b2(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa byen pa dang / btung ba 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen pa g.yos par 'gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag
494b3(yum): thams cad dang mdu g.yos pa 'di lnga ste/ g.yos rab tu yos kun tu rab tu g.yos 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul te/ bdud gyi gnas thams
494b4(yum): cad khrogs shing bar gyur ro/ stong gsum gri stong chen po'i 'jig rten gro khams na rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags 'tshal ci sred yod pa de dag pa
494b5(yum): 'ang byang chu pa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der logs su rab tu btung bar gyur to/ dus ma yin pa'i me tog gi dag kyang steng gi bar snang la
494b6(yum): 'ang gau char dag kyang bab po/ lnga'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal chen po bzhi dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag du dus
494b7(yum): gri bre ma dang / me tog dag gis 'bor mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thong zhing tshig 'di skad ces kyang rigs kri bu khyod kyi mthus de bdag cag
494b8(yum): nga ngo lnga pa las byung ba'i gtam/ 'jig rten thams cad rang pi mthun pa/ gang 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so zhes 'dre/

495b1(yum): sgrub pa dang / de dga' ba dang rangs pa de dang ldan pas nga la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ bdag nams mkha' la
495b2(yum): nase byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam du ses so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
495b3(yum): sems chen po rtag tu du mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems sems kyis nas/ de la me tog ma dar ba dag byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu me tog 'dir//
495b4(yum): gis byang cha nyis dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig/ 'di ni khyod ngas yongs su bzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus

495b6(yum): sems rnyed par dka' zhes smras so ngo nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/
495b7(yum): byang chubs mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par tu gtor nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos la

496a8(yum): thu dus chang sngon gyi pha mo la grogs bu mo lnga bcu po de dag thams cad rkun gyis brgyan te/ shing na lnga brgya yang brgyan gyi sa nas thams cad byang chub sems
496b1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'grus la bul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag na 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir

496b3(yum): semasan na ngos bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// yongs su btang ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
496b4(yum): 'ango \u0f7f'o/ de lta chos smra ba dag la mchod pa bu nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gsheg

496b6(yum): thos pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs khas pa yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem
496b7(yum): na pa chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag du'i dge
496b8(yum): rtsa ba yongs su bsad ba'i phyir blangs so// blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu du de nyid la spar byin no/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla phags stan lang

498a3(yum): rdul dul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar
498a4(yum): 'akyi kha/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni ba'i/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir 'dong pa'i zhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus

498a7(yum): su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu po lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te// rang rang gi khrag gis sa grogs de chag chag btab sa/
498a8(yum): gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba'i glags rnyed par ma 'gyur bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang // bu ma/

498b3(yum): rdzogs pa'i bya thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di la ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdugasngal da
498b4(yum): du med pa sa can thams cad thar bar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bkru pa la zhugs ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag
498b5(yum): thabs dzin gyi chur byin gyis rlabs te lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas phyogs de khor khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya chang

498b8(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus tha
499a1(yum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du

499a3(yum): me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chang ba la gtor bar bya ba'i
499a4(yum): me tog sngags rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so//
499a5(yum): rogs me tog man dA ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyi sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram par bgyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
499a6(yum): 'phags chos ching se ge'i khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ces lha re lnga'i be tog khal stong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
499a7(yum): tu rus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der me tog bkram par byas so// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
499a8(yum): chen bachas 'phags la gtor to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang zhing nge 'dzin de langs te/ chos kyi stan ga
499b1(yum): na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan btang ba la 'dun ste/ 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bsor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa son/
499b2(yum): to/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste dper na/
499b3(yum): bsam gtan dang po la sdom par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob po/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen//
499b4(yum): bo chos 'phyags shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos tham
499b5(yum): cad da da pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid
499b6(yum): ngas pa med pa nyid do/ chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du
499b7(yum): na pa mud pa nyid do/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol
499b8(yum): adu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas she
499b9(yum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab
499b10(yum): kyi yang phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
499b11(yum): rnams dang / me par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid
499b12(yum): / de bzhin su khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// nam mkha' mya med pa nyid pas
499b13(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam ma pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pa
499b14(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do// thams cad
499b15(yum): rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa cing ngo // chos thams cad byed pa meng bcid pas shes rab kyi pha
499b16(yum): na yod pa dar 'ongs nas san bang bal 'jug ste/ 'khor 'bras phrag dums yongs su bsod cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stod/
499b17(yum): to/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste dper na/
499b18(yum): bsam gdan drang po la sdom par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob po/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
499b19(yum): bo chos 'phyags / sa rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos tha
499b20(yum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid
499b21(yum): na sa / shes bgyi 'dzus
499b22(yum): ngas pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad bu med pa nyid pas zhes rab kyi pha rol du
499b23(yum): don pa mud pa nyid do/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol
500a1(yum): du phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// nam mkha' ma med pa nyid byas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas
500a2(yum): pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rabasna tshogs pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes
500a3(yum): phrin+da pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
500a4(yum): rnams dang / rgya me par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid
500a5(yum): de bzhin khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// nam mkha'i mya med pa nyid pas
500a6(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam ma pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pa
500a7(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid ngo // thams cad
500a8(yum): rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med ba nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol
500b1(yum): tu phrin pa byed pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang chu
500b2(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya'i ting nge 'dzin thobs par gyur to// chos thams dben pa zhes
500b3(yum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dung / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rloms sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // chos
500b4(yum): thams cad khengs pa yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
500b5(yum): thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i mu med pa'i zhes
500b6(yum): ni dang / rgya mtshom med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sa tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'am mkha'i rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
500b7(yum): ro'i dang / gzugs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang // rnams par shes su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
500b8(yum): dzan na dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam
501a1(yum): mkha'i khams bu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad pa dris pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
501a2(yum): chos thams cad rang bzhin dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
501a3(yum): thams cad byer pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sem
501a4(yum): dpa' chen sa du dus de dag la spogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sgo 'bum phrag drug bcu thob par gyur to// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/
501a5(yum): gas kyi rims bad bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag
501a6(yum): drug bcu thob pa thag chu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshabs dang / 'og dang / steng phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i
501a7(yum): jug rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma sred dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ba sreng dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su ba
501a8(yum): cing byang bar yongs su bzung ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol cu phyin pa 'di thang shig/ chos shig lcogs shig/ kud pabar gyis shig/ gzhan la yang /
501a9(yum): sa su
501b1(yum): yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems chen po dag gis mnyan par bya/ bzung /
501b2(yum): bar bya/ bzung bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ 'dod par bya/ lung nod par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha don du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis ba
501b3(yum): kyis glegs par chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / bug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / bdug
501b4(yum): dang / rgya mtshan dang / pa ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang pos bkur sIr bya/ bla mar bu/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ rjed par
501b5(yum): bya/ gas/ ban bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni de yi rjes su bstan pa'o// kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston yin nam/ kun dga'
501b6(yum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa legs so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa legs so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
501b7(yum): kyis ma dong ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bong bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi smon pa yin to// khyod kyis yongs su snang ngo // kun dag
501b8(yum): da kyi lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas so// kun dag
502a1(yum): kun po de lta bas na nga lta rang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sgra 'di la khrod kyis 'phangs pa dang / dad pa dang gus par bus pa de bzhin du
502a2(yum): da des nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' bo ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes
502a3(yum): puthA hA mi 'gyur bar khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su gtang ngo / rjes su yongs su gtang ngo / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten
502a4(yum): na ji sa pa de srid du bu de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo srid du bzhin gshegs pa chos snyan par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo
502a5(yum): gang shes ra rtse rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang /
502a6(yum): kha don du byungayi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / gdugs pa dang / spos dang / me dog phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang
502a7(yum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan dag dang / khong khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa mang po dag gis bkur steng byed/ bla mar byed/ mar byung / mchod pabye
502a8(yum): rjed par byed/ gsol par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu sems can de dag sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma thal ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa ni/ swa 'jam zhing san pa ying
502b1(yum): 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu ga yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/ swa 'jam zhing sman pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sA nges sems can de dag
502b2(yum): dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de'i 'khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing legs par 'bab pa chu ha cang yang mi grang ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba
502b3(yum): ngag yod de/ de la sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa rin po che sna bdun gyi gru dag yod de/ der sems can ngag zhugs nas rtse zhing dga' la yongasu spyod do//
502b4(yum): de chu thams kyang me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog rigs che zhing bzang lnga zhib po'i ngang ldang ba gzhan dag gis
502b5(yum): kyang khye mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gis rigs las de na med pa gang yang mong ngo / grong khyer de'i nang na skyed pos
502b6(yum): 'ad de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rnam par dkra zhing bldan sdug pa sha stag ste/ sbeng mos 'tshal de dag re re na yang rdzing du
502b7(yum): 'khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi khong yug thams cad nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu na nga
502b8(yum): par+d+ham+b+ha dang pad ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing bldan sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khyebs shing me tog ud pal dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dang / 'angam/
503a1(yum): dkar po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i phang lo tsam ste/ sngon po kha dog sdong po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ ser
503a2(yum): po kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po 'byung po/ dmar po kha dog dmar po/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dkar po kha dog dkar po/ dkar bo lta bu
503a3(yum): ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'brang bdag yod do// rdzing dbung dag thams cad na dang pa dang / ngung pa dang / khrung khung dang / pra ka ran dadang / ga'ang dang / gang shang
503a4(yum): 'dren pa das yod du/ skye ngos la du ga rnams pad kyang yang chub shA su da snang / sa sa byung nga zang shes ran tham
503a5(yum): phyin pa spyod cing yun ring por chos zab mo la lhag par mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyer de dag
503a6(yum): gi dbus kyi gzhi mngon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ 'khor yug tu dpag chad kyi chang tsam yod pa nam
503a7(yum): bar bas zhing bltan sdug pa/ rab rim bdun dang / nya la'i phreng ba rim po bdun gyis yongs su song bzhig yod do// khang pa denakhang pa'i longs spyod du nag byu ba
503a8(yum): shes bya ba'i snying mos 'tshal dang / myang na med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan dang bral ba zhes byab dang / mi thog tshogs pa nas bu nga'i chung mos chal bzhi yo pa kyims
503b1(yum): chal re re re na yang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang po'i mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba ces bya ba dang / dga' ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba/
503b2(yum): dang / bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de de rnams kyi ngos gcig ni gser las byas pa'o// ngos gnyis
503b3(yum): pa ni dngul las byas pa'o// ngos gsum ma ni bai du ru las byas pa'o// ngos bzhi pa ni shel sal byas pa'o// rang gi sa gzhi ni ke ke ru las byas pa la gser gyi phye
503b4(yum): ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la yang them skas rin po che sna ba tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa/ skas kyi rim pas mdzes par byas pa brgyad brgyad yod de
503b5(yum): thems la de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog kut+pa dang / ud pa la dang /
503b6(yum): pa tsam dkar po sna tshogs kyis khe bas shing ngang pa dang / dur pa dang / khrung khrung / gzhad rnams skad 'byin to/ rdzing bu de dag gi 'khor yug kun nas me tog gi shing pa sna tshogs
503b7(yum): skyes la/ me tog gi shing de dag lce rlung gis bsong pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/ rdzing bu'i nga dag thams cad kyi chu yang can ngan gyi ngar phyogs shing la/
503b8(yum): ngang dang ldan zhing dri dang ldan no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'alags 'khor dang bcas pa/ bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu
504a1(yum): a @#'dod pa'i yod tan lnga dang ldan zhing // 'byor te rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de nas sems can skyes pa dang / bud med gang gas
504a2(yum): ngag 'khor pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed pos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur yongasu
504a3(yum): spyod do// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor nas dang lhan cig ce dga' ste/ dga' mgur spyod cing den dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha/
504a4(yum): rol pa gan to// sems can gang dag grong khyer sros ldanan 'khor de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus gzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen za chas 'phags kyi khrigs
504a5(yum): kyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / baM bdur+ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkab pa btsugs pa/ shing bal gting ba/ stan nang tshangs can bting ba/ steng snying po can du byas pa/
504a6(yum): ma gushi ka'i ras bting ba/ 'bang du rgya grags byed yod pa bshams te/ seng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bris shing de ltar chos la gus par byed pas
504a7(yum): phyogs de 'khor yug tu me tog kha dogs lnga pa dag mngon par 'thor ni ngas phyogs de yang spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed do// de la/
504a8(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ni de lta bur gus par byed cing /
504b1(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do// de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po sog
504b2(yum): chags stong phrag mang po/ srog phyags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni lung nor/ la la ni kha don byed/ la la ni yi ger 'dri/ la la ni tshul bzhin
504b3(yum): yid la byed pas rtogs par byed do// rgyu de dang rkyen nges sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
504b4(yum): byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du shig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
504b5(yum): phyir pa thos par 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes nyen to/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang sgra yang dag par ston pa// yang
504b6(yum): dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzeng stong pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon da ltar khyod ci ltar ral ba bzhi
504b7(yum): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyis rigs kyi bu khrod nyin dang mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyud ma chad par song shig dang ring po mi thogs par shes
504b8(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zos par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshig de thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / yid rang
505a1(yum): pa dang / rab tum pa zhing dga' ba dang / yid bang bsdus pa snang bani 'ams/ dbang na smras za ba 'du dgags sa thas dus na
505a2(yum): la byang gzhan pa srung gyi gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las zang bar byed pa/ bras rngu 'byid pa'i sman pa bdag kyis rapa rnyeng ba bzang snyam dumams par 'gyur ba/
505a3(yum): dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nag du du yang gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par thos par byer cing gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yang
505a4(yum): pa byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis rnam mthong bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yod la mi byeng ngo // dengs byang chubs
505a5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chas tu dus phyogs dbang du 'dugs/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sngo du ma mngon du 'gyur ba
505a6(yum): su myong ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
505a7(yum): chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam pa tha dad pa med zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
505a8(yum): ba med par mthong ba zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar zung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mur pa dang bral ba zhes tha
505b1(yum): na dpa / tshas byams sa gas gas la bzhes bya smya nga ba
505b2(yum): 'og pa kram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi sku bo mi grub pa zhes za ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sprus rnam par sbyangs bzhes
505b3(yum): bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thabs cad kyis sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da/
505b4(yum): sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
505b5(yum): rang / swa dang tshig 'grusna tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mkhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang zhin rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting /
505b6(yum): 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rna bar thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i tshig
505b7(yum): dang 'phrul shin tu mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnams par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sa
505b8(yum): ba med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang chungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // gzug
506a1(yum): rdul med la zhes bya ba'i ting de'i rang /
506a2(yum): kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya
506a3(yum): ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpag 'byin pa sbyid pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / so ge mngon par spyon
506a4(yum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / @
506a5(yum): ma dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / the tsom thams cad bcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
506a6(yum): chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
506a7(yum): chos thams cad la mngon par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thabs cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thabs cad bye drug
506a8(yum): med par lta bar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thib po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i
506a9(yum): nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 9
506b1(yum): lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'jog
506b2(yum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum las mngon par ma zhen pa
506b3(yum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te/ de ting nge 'dzin
506b4(yum): de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
506b5(yum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di
506b6(yum): skad kyang gsung ngo // rigs kyis bu ngas kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du yongs su btsal te/ yongs su chol
506b7(yum): ban yang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas te rtogs pa na gang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba'am/ lta bar bya byam/ byang chub spyad pa'am//
506b8(yum): gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / rigs kyi bu shes rab
507a1(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'ang nas/ rigs chos gang gis kyi rnam sangs sam/ masangs sang ba ma thang ba lagan nas
507a2(yum): sa 'ji 'an pa'i lus gsang gyi 'dog lta thobs/ skyes bachen pa'am na sum brgya swA dang / dbazung babang po ma pas nga 'da' sa gang
507a3(yum): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin blan med pa dang / yon tan thams cad kyi ro
507a4(yum): phyin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad gzung ba 'am/ mtha' bstan par mi nus na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci spos/ rigs kyi
507a5(yum): de lta bas na khyod kyis 'di dag nyid la rab tu gnyer ba dang / 'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don tu gnye ba dang / 'dun pa la ni bla na med
507a6(yum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyeng bar dka' ba ma yin no// khyod kyis dge ba'i bshos gnyen la shin tu gus pa skyed par bya'o/ 'phangs par bya'o//
507a7(yum): dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chusams dpa' sems dpa' chen po na myung du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
507a8(yum): par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs par ngag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi dge ba'i bshes
507b1(yum): gnyen gang legs/ de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi/
507b2(yum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang byu hu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la bslabs so//
507b3(yum): rigs kyi bu ni khyod yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i shes gnyen yin gyis des khyod la ci sad bsgo ba bzhin zung shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub se/
507b4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa'am/ bskal panyis sam/ bskal ba brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang ma/
507b5(yum): la mthong bzhin du thogs shing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang / s+tha dang / dri
507b6(yum): ro dang / reg bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la skad cig tsam gyi drin lan lon pa ma yin no// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
507b7(yum): thus khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa thos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to//
507b8(yum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag du du dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'an
508a1(yum): de las langs so// langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas brod/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang bzhud
508a2(yum): sam ste/ de nga bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong ba'i gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to// yang 'di sum du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
508a3(yum): 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste bdag yongs su 'dzin pa/ bdag gi dge ba
508a4(yum): bshes gnyen yin zhing yun ring po nas nges bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du mngon par
508a5(yum): ste nye bar phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces byas don 'di nyid 'dri'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub se
508a6(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chas 'phags la dga' ba dang / ri mo dang / gus par byed pa nye bar gzhag ste/
508a7(yum): skye bar bzhag nas 'di sum dus mas so/ bdag gis cil bu'i bkur snying bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar
508a8(yum): ni dbul po// gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems ma chen pa kyim phags la bang gags bgrang mang bu tshanas na mtha 'am mabang ngam ni bra #
508b1(yum): gam/ bai dur+ya 'am/ rung ngam/ man shel lam/ byi ru 'am/ dngul lam/ sa le snga ma 'am/ me tog gam/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ba'am/ byug pa'am/ khyim
508b2(yum): gdugs de lta bu yang bdag la med na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags drung du song na ni bdag gis tshul yin pa bras
508b3(yum): par 'gyur to// bdag dga' ba 'am/ rangs pa yang mi spro'o snyam du sems so// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu de lta bu'i yod gtan ngag dang /
508b4(yum): zla ba la gus pa yid la byed pa dang / ldan pas mthar gyis shir phyogs su song ste/ grong khyer chen po shin yangs pa/ 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde bab lo lags pa
508b5(yum): skye bo mang po dang mis yongs su gang ba zhig tu phyin pa dang / de'i grong kyi dbus su ngo 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la de'i rin gyis byang chub
508b6(yum): sems dpa' dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya'o// yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad de/ dengs la btsongs te/ 'khor ba dpag du med
508b7(yum): pa nas 'dod pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang 'di lta du ma chos kyi phying ram/
508b8(yum): lta bu'i sems rnon po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam mo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngung grong bar du 'dug ste// nga
